more description: Freehand Hotel is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Experience the comfortable and casual vibe designed by Roman & Williams in River North Chicago, just two blocks from the Magnificent Mile. Walking distance to public transportation, Navy Pier, and more.$10 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long-term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.The spaceThe private queen rooms are like traditional hotel rooms—private with an en-suite bathroom, TV, and phone. They all have walk-in showers, most of them have a desk area, and some have a bed pushed up against the wall.Guest accessBesides your private room, you will have access to all public spaces and amenities at the hotel including the Broken Shaker cocktail bar. Coin-operated and valet laundry are availableOther things to noteTo check-in, the hotel requires guests must be 18 or older with a government-issued photo ID. Your room and tax will be prepaid through Airbnb, but the hotel requires a $50 deposit for incidentals on a card at check-in per room, per stay. We do not accept gift cards, prepaid cards, or cash for incidentals. The deposit will be released back to your card at checkout provided you do not charge anything to your room. It takes most banks 3-10 business days to process the release.$10 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long-term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.License numberR18000024404

Welcome to Selina Chicago 

Whether you’re a digital nomad, a travel-addict, an adventurous backpacker, or a surfer looking for paradise, you’ve come to the right place. From global cities to urban hubs, remote destinations, and off-the-grid destinations, develop a deeper connection with the world when you stay at Selina.The spaceA classic stay: affordable and comfortable. name: Hotel room in Chicago
unit rental details: Room in boutique hotel hosted by Freehand1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in February 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Join us at Freehand Chicago Hotel for your travels in Chicago. Perfect for travelers here too long for a traditional hotel or for just 1 night; make us your home away from home.This listing is for one bunk for one person in a shared mixed/co-ed room with 4 bunks (up to 3 roommates). We have many options such as private standard rooms and private quad rooms. Please send us a message with any questions.$5 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyThe spaceSomewhere between a hostel and hotel, you'll find the amenities you need to get through anywhere from a week to a few months. This listing is for one twin bunk in a shared room with four total bunks, so you would have up to 3 roommates. The room has a private bathroom and lockers for storing valuables. Each bunk features a curtain for privacy, reading lamp, and power outlet. Linens and towels are included, as is regular housekeeping service.  One piece of luggage, one personal item (such as a book bag), and 3-4 hanging items of clothing permitted. For the lockers, guests are welcome to use their own lock or the front desk sells combination padlocks for $5.Please ask the front desk if you need complimentary extra towels, blankets, or toiletries.Guest accessBesides your bunk, you will have access to all public spaces and amenities at the hotel including the Broken Shaker cocktail bar. Coin-operated and valet laundry are available.Other things to noteTo check-in, the hotel requires guests must be 18 or older with a government-issued photo ID. Your room and tax will be prepaid through Airbnb, but the hotel requires a $50 deposit for incidentals on a card at check-in per room, per stay. We do not accept gift cards, prepaid cards, or cash for incidentals. The deposit will be released back to your card at checkout provided you do not charge anything to your room. It takes most banks 3-10 business days to process the release.$5 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.License numberR18000024404

Heated floors mean your toes are never cold and thoughtful design means every inch of this cozy apartment has just what you need where you need it.

description: Cozy Vintage Chicago Apartment near Downtown
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Jeffrey4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: VERY CLEAN This is your launching pad to see the city! It is a vintage apartment with your own private entrance and space.  It is within walking distance of a large selection of restaurants, bars and cafes. With a bicycle, cab, Uber/Lyft, bus or EL train you can be downtown in minutes. In close proximity to many of Chicago's great locations such as Wrigley Field, The United Center, White Sox Park, etc...Located in the Ukrainian Village it is a safe, welcoming neighborhood with plenty of history.The space*****We thoroughly clean between each guest with a mix of disinfecting alcohol mixed with cleaning solution. Bedding and towels are cleaned after each guest.  -----Like many places in Chicago it has some 100year old unique characters. This is a garden unit as we call it in Chicago which means its a couple steps down below outside grade. There are also plenty of modern details though like fast and reliable wi-fi connection and charging ports for phones/electronics. There is a office with a office desk/chair to work on. The bedroom has a queen sized bed with a dresser and closet. I provide two suit case stands. It has a large TV with Amazon Prime, Netflix and locals stations to watch. I provide some guide book information about the city. We put together a guide book of walk-able neighborhood suggestions. If you are long term traveling you have access to free washer and dryer. Please be aware that you may need to duck slightly in some isolated spots especially if you are above my height of 5'-10". I have no issues at my height but I do have to duck a little to get in the main door.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Chicago! Our 1BR apartment is a perfect place to stay on any Chicago getaway, whether business or vacation. It is professionally designed with a full kitchen, living room, and modern touch, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.The spaceThe apartment building is within steps to stores, restaurants, transportation. It's one great spot in the City!  In the heart of trendy Lakeview Chicago, our sophisticated 1-bedroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming, quiet neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train to take you south to Downtown or north to Loyola and Evanston.  Illuminated by sunny natural light, our place Queen-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.  The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!

more description: Our one-bedroom apartment in Chicago is the ideal place to stay for any trip, whether it's for work or pleasure. It is beautifully designed, complete with a full kitchen, living area, modern touches, WiFi, and all the necessities for a comfortable stay.The apartment building is close to restaurants, shops, and transit. It's a fantastic location in the city!The spaceOur apartment has a queen bed, premium linens, and lots of closet space.  Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and air-conditioning units that are individually controlled.There is also one full bathroom with a shower, sink, and toilet. Shampoo, conditioner, and body wash are available, as well as hand soap and fluffy towels. There's nothing like a hot shower to warm up after a Chicago walk!There is plenty of room for guests to relax on the sofa and watch TV on the flat-screen TV. You'll live in luxury, like the rest of the unit, with hardwood floors and modern décor.Our kitchen is fully equipped with cookware, pans, and utensils, as well as sleek granite countertops, so whether you're seeking a home-cooked meal or simply a place to put the box of deep-dish pizza, it's the place to be. A full-sized fridge and freezer, a gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker are among the appliances.

more description: Remodeled 3rd floor private suite a few miles west of the Chicago Loop! NEW Memory foam queen bed, twin bed, and a comfy 3 person couch.  The space is comfortable, cozy, and is a private studio apartment without a full kitchen. The unit does have a mini fridge, microwave, toaster oven, & dish-ware/utensils. There is central heat/AC, Flat screen TV (Netflix & Prime), and high speed WIFI. The space is work ready with a desk area to setup your laptop! Or work outside in the private backyard!The spaceThe space is clean, cozy, and freshly remodeled. Self check-in instructions are provided via the airbnb app. All locks are digital so there is no worrying about carrying/losing bulky keys. Guests enjoy a new memory foam queen size bed with plenty of pillows. There is a Single bed in the wall nook opposite the bathroom which provides some privacy from the queen bed area. White Linens are replaced frequently so they always feel new and fresh. Kick back and relax on the comfy 3 person sofa while streaming a movie on the flat screen via Netflix or Prime video. Keep your take out in the mini fridge and reheat it for a late night snack in the microwave or toaster oven! Wake up with some caffeine using the coffee maker. The unit is professionally cleaned and sanitized after every reservation ensuring our guests the safest stay possible. The suite is ideal for 3 guests with a max of 4 guests. We look forward to hosting you!

description: P6. Next to Downtown! Best location
name: Private room in Chicago
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Aaron Emisael2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in August 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Description: Everybody is welcome to our lovely home! Location is the best part of it. Many great restaurants and fun things to do around. One of the nicest areas in the City. We are literally next to Downtown! 15-20min to heart of Downtown by car or public transportation. Blue line train station close by( 24/7 working train). Going straight to the airport and Downtown. Fee parking on the street around.Other things to noteThe room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! The room has one full size bed. If you want to add 3rd or 4th guest in the reservation I could add 1 extra air mattress with no extra fee if the reservation is set for 3 or 4. If the reservation is for 2 and you’d like to have an extra air mattress we charge $15p/night and we provide air mattress and linens for it. the room will become smaller for luggage becase you will have two beds on it. This is a good option if you want to save even more money otherwise you can book two rooms! As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds/noise. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

more description: This stylish and clean top floor 1 BR 1 BA condo is located on Hubbard Street in the edge of the bustling West Loop neighborhood. A 15 min walk to the heart of the West Loop/Fulton Market and directly across from one of Chicago’s most well known street art corridors - the B_Line.The spaceThis airy and charming condo boasts exposed brick, 9 ft ceilings, and a mini south facing balcony off of the open concept living space.The condo is located in a 3 story building with a locked front gate for extra peace of mind. There are 2 flights of stairs to climb to get into the unit. You walk into a sunlit open concept kitchen and living space. The kitchen is fully-stocked for all of your cooking needs. The bedroom which holds a full size bed is just off of the kitchen. The bathroom can be accessed from the bedroom or off of the hallway. A large open closet in the bedroom houses the washer/dryer unit.

more description: A newly remodeled home for your longer stay, complete with Wi-Fi and everything you need to enjoy your perfect Chicago getaway.Our terrific 1-bedroom/1-bathroom in St. Ben's walkup features a fully furnished living space, a full kitchen, cozy bedroom, and bathroom. It is professionally designed with modern furniture. Only a short walk to everything you will ever need at your convenience.The spaceOur sophisticated one bedroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for your city adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming neighborhood with easy access to an eclectic mix of shops, restaurants, music establishments, and theaters.Illuminated by sunny natural light, our apartment features King size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has stylish counter top. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!

more description: A newly remodeled home, complete with everything you need to enjoy your perfect Chicago getaway!  Our terrific 1-bedroom/1-bathroom unit features a fully furnished living space, a full kitchen, cozy bedroom with king-sized bed, and bathroom. It is professionally designed with modern furniture and only a short walk to everything you will ever need.The spaceIn the heart of trendy Lakeview Chicago, our sophisticated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming, quiet neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train.Our apartment features a king size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!

description: 10% Winter Promo! 1BR Chic Apt Close to Everything
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Jaden2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay.  Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bath apartment is just 1 mile from Wrigley Field and is ideal for any Chicago getaway.  Please make yourself at home in this gorgeous apartment; our place is yours and only yours during your stay.The spaceWe do ask that you respect our neighbors by keeping noise to a reasonable level.  Just west of Chicago’s hip Lake View neighborhood and steps from the Paulina-Lincoln/Roscoe L Station, our residential location is the perfect place to relax and recharge on any trip to vibrant Chicago. Here you’ll find cozy restaurants, low-key bars, eclectic boutiques, and all the essentials for a comfortable stay. There’s a Target just 5 minutes away on foot (home of things you never knew you needed), several banks, a Whole Foods Market, and a variety of exercise options including a YMCA, Pure Barre, and Core Power Yoga all within a couple of blocks. You’ll find a plethora of fantastic places to eat and drink just minutes away. Don’t miss the exquisite pastries from Loba Pastry + Coffee or the German delicacies from Dinkel's Bakery - both excellent ways to start the day.  In the mood for tacos? Head to Cafe El Tapatio for authentic Mexican eats. Or dig into some spicy curry or noodles at Thai Thank You (pro tip: it’s BYOB). And pizza never disappoints, especially when it’s from Pizzeria Serio. Wash it all down with a cold treat from Scooter's Frozen Custard or Jeni's Splendid Ice Creams, and you’ve got a memorable eating experience. Our place is just a 3-minute walk from Paulina-Lincoln/Roscoe Station, where you can catch the Brown Line train. The Brown Line will take you south to Downtown Chicago in just about 15 minutes, or you can head north to Uptown or Evanston when you transfer to the Red Line at Belmont Station.  Flying into Chicago? We’re a 20-minute drive from O’Hare when there is no traffic, but if there is traffic you may be better off taking public transit (and saving some $$ on the taxi or Uber fare).

more description: Conveniently situated across the street from Loyola University’s Rogers Park Campus and close to cafés, restaurants and shops, this brand new modern and stylish one bedroom residence presents a new standard in luxurious modern living.About the unit:-1 Bedroom-1 Bathroom-Sofa Bed in living room-Tall ceilings-Beautiful natural lighting from large windows-In unit washer/dryerFor those in need of parking, you can rent a garage space for $30/night.There is also free bike storage availableThe spaceGuests have access to a 4,000 sqft outdoor space, ideal for families and groups. Prepare meals on the grilling stations before gathering around the café tables or large community table. Relax in front of the fire pit with lounge seating or have fun on the ping-pong table. There is also an indoor amenity space available with a communal kitchen and a large table while there’s also a lounge with televisions plus an arcade game and a private conference room with a television. A high-end fitness room complete with basic equipment.Please note that we strictly do not allow ANY PARTIES, GATHERINGS OR OUTSIDE GUESTS WHATSOEVER, apart from the ones registered (even if they're not staying overnight!). If you decide to experience a stay in one of our modern luxurious suites, we require that you respect the rules, the house, and the neighbors, keep noise levels down at all times and note that this is a strictly NO-SMOKING building. Also, while booking make sure to provide us with the full names and contact info of all guests - we need to have everyone registered for security and insurance purposes.

more description: Are you a Chicago Cubs fan or at least a baseball fan? Then this apartment is for you! Wrigley Field which is one of the oldest still-operating stadiums in MLB is just nearby. Aside from the famous Wrigley Field, you can also enjoy several theaters nearby such as the Music Box Theater and the Playground Theater. There are lots of music venues and shops as well.The space**This listing is shared by multiple units of almost the same size and design. Guests may be assigned to a slightly different one under the same category**In the heart of trendy Lakeview Chicago, our sophisticated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming, quiet neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train.Our apartment features a king size bed,  premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!**AC: We remove the window air conditioner before the winter comes. This prevents cold air from entering during cold weather and protects the window unit from damage caused by snow and ice.****Street parking and meter parking is available nearby. But as it gets more difficult to park at night we recommend parking your car and take the train for your entire stay. The apartment is a 13-minute walk to the Addison train station.

The apartment is completely furnished with a full kitchen, bedroom, living room and bathroom.The spaceIn the heart of trendy Uptown Chicago, our sophisticated 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train to take you south to Downtown or north to Loyola and Evanston.Illuminated by sunny natural light, our apartment features two Queen-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. more description: Beautiful and spacious private studio with a FREE parking spot. The elegant and maintained interior showcases stylish furniture and tasteful art. Enjoy your own workspace to catch up on e-mails or relax in the comfort of a queen-sized bed. Watch all your favorite shows on the SmartTV with complimentary Netflix provided. Convenient location close to the Montrose Blue Line Station and Six Corners.The spaceThis unit is located in Portage Park and is ideal for a couple of travelers looking to explore the city, or for remote working in a safe and clean environment. The entire apartment has been renovated and tastefully furnished. The bed is queen sized with memory foam mattress. The bathroom has a large walk-in shower and comes with shampoo, conditioner, soap and all towels. The apartment is equipped with a flat screen TV giving guests access to Netflix, HBO and more. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to prepare a meal. There is a coin-operated laundry room in the basement of the building. The Montrose train stop (Blue Line) is a half mile away from the apartment, and is walking distance to beautiful Six Corners where you can check out some great shops, music venues, theaters, and international restaurants.

more description: Relax in a quite spacious apartment, close enough to the city/China town/white socks stadium and more.Turtle’s Bar and Grill, Gio’s Italian cafe and deli, and La Malinche Coffee and Tea house, all within a 5 to 15min walk. Small bathroom and kitchen, closet in the bedroom and walk in closed by the kitchen, plus extra room once you walk it to the apartment like a waiting room/ storage room. No I do not have microwave it’s not healthy plus not enough counter space for it.

more description: This apartment is located in the heart of Portage Park and is close to transportation, great restaurants, bars, Starbucks, shopping, and so much more. This is a renovated studio that features heat and water included, updated kitchen, spacious living area, hardwood floors, great closet space, updated bathroom and laundry room in building.The spaceOur studio apartment includes heat and water as well as a renovated kitchen, a roomy living area, wood floors, plenty of storage space, and an improved bathroom.The kitchen comes fully equipped with all the cookware, utensils, and plates you could possibly need, whether you're perfecting your toast-making techniques or preparing a five-course meal. A stove, oven, full-size refrigerator and freezer, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker are among the appliances. **AC: We remove the window air conditioner before the winter comes. This prevents cold air from entering during cold weather and protects the window unit from damage caused by snow and ice.**

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Lane4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Bucktown is a trendy Chicago neighborhood. This is a walkable neighborhood with plenty of shopping, dining, and artistic entertainment, as well as public transportation. There is live music, art exhibits, live theater, and themed bars. Restaurants abound, serving a variety of cuisines.Mariano's is a popular upscale grocery store in the area, and public parks such as Holstein Park, Churchill Park, and Ehrler Park are nearby. This stylish place to stay is perfect for group trips.The spaceEnjoy your stay in this beautifully designed apartment! Our two-bedroom apartment is spacious, bright, and well-lit. Decorated with contemporary and chic furniture, as well as a fully equipped kitchen with high-quality appliances.The spacious living room and fully equipped kitchen make you feel right at home the moment you walk in.Our cozy two-bedroom has one queen bed in each room. One of them has a desk where you can catch up on emails.Our chic bathroom also has a modern design touch, with bathroom fixtures such as a sink, toilet, and shower. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, utensils, and cookware. A stove, oven, full-size refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker are among the appliances. You may also use the in-unit washer/dryer during your stay.**Wi-Fi will be available soon.**

more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bath condo is just 1 mile from Wrigley Field and is ideal for any Chicago getaway. It features a full kitchen, a private bedroom, and conveniences like a full kitchen and fast WiFi.The spaceIlluminated by sunny natural light, our 1 bedroom features a king-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free, fast WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!

more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bath condo is just 1 mile from Wrigley Field and is ideal for any Chicago getaway. It features a full kitchen, a private bedroom, and conveniences like a full kitchen and fast WiFi.The spaceIlluminated by sunny natural light, our 1 bedroom features Queen-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free, fast WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!

more description: Freehand Hotel is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Experience the comfortable and casual vibe designed by Roman & Williams in River North Chicago, just two blocks from the Magnificent Mile. Walking distance to public transportation, Navy Pier, and more.$10 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long-term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.The spaceThe private queen rooms are like traditional hotel rooms—private with an en-suite bathroom, TV, and phone. They all have walk-in showers, most of them have a desk area, and some have a bed pushed up against the wall.Guest accessBesides your private room, you will have access to all public spaces and amenities at the hotel including the Broken Shaker cocktail bar. Coin-operated and valet laundry are availableOther things to noteTo check-in, the hotel requires guests must be 18 or older with a government-issued photo ID. Your room and tax will be prepaid through Airbnb, but the hotel requires a $50 deposit for incidentals on a card at check-in per room, per stay. We do not accept gift cards, prepaid cards, or cash for incidentals. The deposit will be released back to your card at checkout provided you do not charge anything to your room. It takes most banks 3-10 business days to process the release.$10 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long-term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.License numberR18000024404

more description: Unbeatable location in right in front of United Center and next to Downtown This is the perfect spot if you want to go to an event at United Center because in less than 2 min walking you will be there! Also it’s pretty close to Downtown and to Rush and The Illinois Medical District! Downtown Chicago is 10-15 minutes far by car and 20-30 minutes by public transportation. Blue line train that works 24 hours is 14th n away by walk.The spaceYou will have a Full Size Bed in a private bedroom, there is also a futon, and we can add an extra air mattress if the reservation is set for 4 or 5, but in this case the bedroom will become smaller. If the reservation is set for less than 4 guests we can add an extra air mattress  for extra 15$ per night.This is a private bedroom in a shared place with other Airbnb guests and because of that we expect to keep the house  very quiet, specially after 9pm.If you are driving the private spot is 20$ per night . The other option is the  permit sticker to have permission to park in the street and it’s 10$ per night per car (ask if your preference is available becase sometimes we don’t have available) *I only accept payments through Airbnb platform*

more description: Join us at Freehand Chicago Hotel for your travels in Chicago. Perfect for travelers here too long for a traditional hotel or for just 1 night; make us your home away from home.This listing is for one bunk for one person in a shared mixed/co-ed room with 4 bunks (up to 3 roommates). We have many options such as private standard rooms and private quad rooms. Please send us a message with any questions.$5 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyThe spaceSomewhere between a hostel and hotel, you'll find the amenities you need to get through anywhere from a week to a few months. This listing is for one twin bunk in a shared room with four total bunks, so you would have up to 3 roommates. The room has a private bathroom and lockers for storing valuables. Each bunk features a curtain for privacy, reading lamp, and power outlet. Linens and towels are included, as is regular housekeeping service.  One piece of luggage, one personal item (such as a book bag), and 3-4 hanging items of clothing permitted. For the lockers, guests are welcome to use their own lock or the front desk sells combination padlocks for $5.Please ask the front desk if you need complimentary extra towels, blankets, or toiletries.Guest accessBesides your bunk, you will have access to all public spaces and amenities at the hotel including the Broken Shaker cocktail bar. Coin-operated and valet laundry are available.Other things to noteTo check-in, the hotel requires guests must be 18 or older with a government-issued photo ID. Your room and tax will be prepaid through Airbnb, but the hotel requires a $50 deposit for incidentals on a card at check-in per room, per stay. We do not accept gift cards, prepaid cards, or cash for incidentals. The deposit will be released back to your card at checkout provided you do not charge anything to your room. It takes most banks 3-10 business days to process the release.$5 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.License numberR18000024404

more description: Located in lakeview / Wrigleyville this is a Private bedroom in a great location just 6min by walk to Wrigley Field (Cubs Stadium).This neighborhood is pretty safe and nightlife is amazing just few blocks away you will find great bars and restaurants that are open until very late. Accesible public transportation 24/7 (Addison red line just 9 min walking and Southport brown line 6 min far by walk) and just 16 min by car / 23 min by Public transportation to Downtown Chicago.The spaceYou will have a full size bed in a private bedroom. You will have a private key for your bedroom . To get in the house or building we use a keypad.Parking is not very easy and it’s not free. You can have a parking permit that will let you park on the street per extra 10$ a night, you will need one ticket every 24 hours and we don’t guarantee parking next to the house. This place has a hostel vibe, so if you enjoy meet new people this is a great place for you. If you enjoy your privacy I’ll recommend you to book an entire place*I only accept payments through Airbnb

description: Bright & Lofty Bucktown 1BR
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Christina3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: My top-floor apartment in Bucktown is the perfect space for your trip to Chicago! It's a stylish, modern rehab in a classic Chicago building, so you really see the best of what the city has to offer! It's just off beautiful Holstein Park, and easy walking distance to 2 Blue Line stops - so you can get to the Loop in under a half hour! And plenty of Logan Square favorites along Milwaukee are a 15 minute walk away - book today!The spaceI want to ensure everyone who stays at my place feels like they are at home and can settle right in, so I provide the following amenities to all my guests!  - My cleaners are professionally trained and follow a tightly regimented cleaning and sanitizing checklist. They are equipped with a full complement of professional cleaning tools and chemicals including a hospital-grade disinfectant.- Fresh towels and linens which are professionally laundered and ironed by a hotel linen company- Wireless internet is always available- TV with streaming options- Kitchen appliances including a microwave, coffee pot with a reusable filter, tea kettle, and toaster  - I provide artisanal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas.- My place is FULLY STOCKED with all the amenities of home like eco friendly shampoo, conditioner, and body wash, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, sponges & Method brand hand soap and dish soap.  You name it, we provide it to make you feel at home!-The full sized kitchen is stocked with cookware, utensils, glasses, cutlery, sharp knives, cutting boards, baking sheets and all the basic tools like wine openers, cheese graters, vegetable peelers, pizza cutters, etc.  - Hair dryer- Ironing board and Iron- Luggage racks and hangers

more description:
Jewelers Row is the architectural gem of the Chicago Loop. Designed by Adler and Sullivan, the innovative style adds a modern touch to the building. Tall windows brighten up each space, complete with a fully equipped kitchen and in-suite laundry. Check out the dynamic food scene and vivid Theater District in this fascinating city. The Bean landmark and State Street shopping are just minutes away. Set between high-rises and Millenium Park, Jewelers Row offers a stylish space for your stay.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
 - 24/7 virtual support 
- Super-fast WiFi 
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
 - Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming 
- Fully equipped kitchen
- In-suite laundry

What’s nearby 
- 3 minute walk to The Gage (inventive American eats with Millennium Park views) 
- 3 minute walk to Pittsfield Cafe (classic diner favorites in a historic building) 
- 9 minute walk to Cindy’s Rooftop (stylish rooftop bar with delicious eats)
 - 5 minute walk to Millennium Park 

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

description: P6. Next to Downtown! Best location
name: Private room in Chicago
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Aaron Emisael2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in August 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Description: Everybody is welcome to our lovely home! Location is the best part of it. Many great restaurants and fun things to do around. One of the nicest areas in the City. We are literally next to Downtown! 15-20min to heart of Downtown by car or public transportation. Blue line train station close by( 24/7 working train). Going straight to the airport and Downtown. Fee parking on the street around.Other things to noteThe room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! The room has one full size bed. If you want to add 3rd or 4th guest in the reservation I could add 1 extra air mattress with no extra fee if the reservation is set for 3 or 4. If the reservation is for 2 and you’d like to have an extra air mattress we charge $15p/night and we provide air mattress and linens for it. the room will become smaller for luggage becase you will have two beds on it. This is a good option if you want to save even more money otherwise you can book two rooms! As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds/noise. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in April 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Hello!We are located in a beautiful neighborhood called Norwood Park. Please note: this Is a room in a full basement with a kitchen and bathroom that is shared with 2 other Airbnb guests. —————Highlights include:-Beautiful hiking/biking trail nearby-Walking distance to bus stop. -Close to major highways -Downtown Chicago: 12 miles away-O’hare airport, Rosemont, All-State Arena: 3 miles away-Advocate Lutheran Hospital: 5 miles away-Amita Resurrection Health Center: 1.4 miles awayThe spaceThe property is located in a quiet safe neighborhood called Norwood Park. The door to the entrance has a Yale keypad lock so guests can conveniently check in on their own. The room is simple and cozy with a bed, desk, and chair. Nothing fancy. The room may not be the most aesthetically pleasing but it is practical. The room is intended for those who need a place to sleep. Please note: this Is a room in a full basement with a kitchen and bathroom that is shared with 2 other Airbnb guests. Also, the room can get chilly at times but we provide a space heater if needed.Lastly, we live on the 1st floor and have a toddler so you’ll hear some noise above you until 11 pm.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bath condo is just 1 mile from Wrigley Field and is ideal for any Chicago getaway. It features a full kitchen, a private bedroom, and conveniences like a full kitchen and fast WiFi.The spaceIlluminated by sunny natural light, our 1 bedroom features a king-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor. The entire place has free, fast WIFI and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Brad & Sara2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.  Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment is a perfect place to stay on any Chicago getaway, whether business or vacation. It is professionally designed with a full kitchen, living room, and modern decor.The spaceIn the heart of Lakeview East Chicago, our sophisticated 1 bedroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train to take you south to Downtown or north to Loyola and Evanston.Illuminated by sunny natural light, our studio features King-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!Street parking is limited and it is difficult to park at night, we recommend parking your car once and taking the train for your entire stay. The Wellington L Station is just a 10 minutes walk away

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Milan4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: • Steps away from McCormick Place• Michigan Avenue location• 2 shifts Security officers in the building• City view• Queen size bed + Sofa bed for 2 extra guests• Comfortable stay for up to 4 guests at a time• Access to the Gym• Dedicated Internet• 4K smart HDTV(Netflix and Roku)• Fully equipped & stocked kitchen with complimentary Coffee & Tea• Walk to Restaurants and Shopping• Minutes to all touristic destinations• Optional Parking space for only $25/dayThe spaceDesigned with the traveler in mind, this Studio Suite (Sleeps 4) caters all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. The Michigan Suites are thriving with downtown vibes. The suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual Airbnb experience. It is uniquely designed to its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, our suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city.At a Glance:- Michigan avenue location- 1 Queen bed in the unit for the initial two guests + sofa bed with fresh bedding is available  for extra two guests in case if the reservation is for 4 people- Custom furnishing- Dedicated Internet- In walking distance to the best bars and restaurantsOur McCormick Lofts have  high ceilings and stunning views of the South loop to make your stay the perfect combination of comfort and lifestyle. Our guests enjoy apartment features including beautiful 10-12 ft lofted ceilings, remodeled floors and kitchens. The fitness room comes in especially handy in the winter, complete with cross training, treadmills, and weight sets.Our properties are the top-rated locations in Chicago! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This can be easily checked in our over 1000 reviews.This property is also rated for the best value in Chicago! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in the city.Central Heating and CoolingContemporary KitchensLarge WindowsNew CountertopsLuxury Vinyl TileStainless Steel AppliancesBedroom ClosetsSteps away from McCormick Place and SquareAround 1 mile to South of Museum CampusEasy Access to Lakefront and Grant ParkEasy Access to Local ExpresswaysEasy Access to Public TransportationWalkscore: 92Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: How far away are you from....A: McCormick? 7-9 min walkThe nearest Subway station? 5-6 min walkSoldier Field? 5 min uber Museum Campus? 7min uberDowntown? 8 min uberQ: PARKING?A: We have an optional parking spot for our renters for only $25/dayQ: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! We provide all these things. We also provide you with a starter pack of toilet papers, individually wrapped toothbrushes, individual toothpastes. Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 11am. Early check-ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses an algorithm to adjust it automatically.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Very. Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on and asked us where we bought the mattresses from.

more description:
Jewelers Row is the architectural gem of the Chicago Loop. Designed by Adler and Sullivan, the innovative style adds a modern touch to the building. Tall windows brighten up each space, complete with a fully equipped kitchen and in-suite laundry. Check out the dynamic food scene and vivid Theater District in this fascinating city. The Bean landmark and State Street shopping are just minutes away. Set between high-rises and Millenium Park, Jewelers Row offers a stylish space for your stay.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
 - 24/7 virtual support 
- Super-fast WiFi 
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
 - Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming 
- Fully equipped kitchen
- In-suite laundry

What’s nearby 
- 3 minute walk to The Gage (inventive American eats with Millennium Park views) 
- 3 minute walk to Pittsfield Cafe (classic diner favorites in a historic building) 
- 9 minute walk to Cindy’s Rooftop (stylish rooftop bar with delicious eats)
 - 5 minute walk to Millennium Park 

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

description: Elegant Uptown Studio near Lake Michigan/Red Line
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Nala & Owen2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to this beautifully renovated studio apartment located in the Uptown neighborhood. This apartment has access to a shared fitness area, backyard/garden, and comfy work station. The building is a block from the Red Line train and is walking distance to neighborhood restaurants, bars, shops, and cafes. This apartment is perfect for remote workers or travelers looking to be in a nice neighborhood close to the city! Check in is completely contactless with a keypad & door code.The spaceThis studio is located in Uptown and is ideal for a couple of travelers looking to explore the city, or for remote working in a safe and clean environment. The entire apartment has been renovated and tastefully furnished. The bed is queen sized with memory foam mattress. The bathroom has a large walk-in shower and comes with shampoo, conditioner, soap and all towels. The apartment is equipped with a flat screen TV with Roku giving guests access to Netflix, HBO and more. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to prepare a meal. There is a washer/dryer combo under the kitchen counter as well. Lastly, if you need to work, there is a foldable desk that guests can use - perfect for a workspace or writing!Guests can use the fitness area downstairs, as well as common area off the shared hallway if needed which includes a larger workspace and lounging area. Guests are also free to enjoy the backyard/garden area that is shared by tenants of the building. There is a BBQ grill, lounge chairs and plenty of space to relax on sunny Chicago day!The Wilson train stop (Red Line) is a block away from the apartment, and is walking distance to beautiful Lake Michigan. Catch a Cubs game at nearby Wrigley Field or take a train to the Loop for some great shops, museums, music venues, famous architecture, and international restaurants.

description: Real Comfort in a 2BR APT close to Wrigley Field
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Mia & Noah4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.Heading to a baseball game or planning a fun-filled Windy City getaway? Our sophisticated 2-bedroom/1-bath apartment is just one block from Wrigley Field, home of the world-famous Chicago Cubs. The apartment features conveniences like a full kitchen and fast WiFi so you can live the Chi-Town life like a local.The spaceJust one short block from Wrigley Field, this charming 2-bedroom apartment is ideal of any visit to the Windy City, whether traveling on business or for a fun-filled vacation. The location is perfect for Cubs games (just a 3-minute walk!) and entertainment, with the Metro concert venue and the Music Box Theatre also a short walk away.But exploring Chicago is only part of the fun, because our sunny apartment is also sure to be a highlight of your time in town. You’ll feel just like a Chicago local with conveniences like a full kitchen, a spacious living room, and fast WiFi. A particularly stylish Chicago local - this apartment oozes modern glamour with professionally curated furnishings and decor.The apartment includes 2 private bedrooms, which features queen size beds, nightstands, a large window, and a closet with hangers. You’ll sleep like a baby Chicagoan on our plush mattresses and stay cozy during a Midwestern winter with high-quality sheets.The chic bathroom also has a touch of modern design, and the bathroom fixtures include a sink, toilet, and a shower. There’s ample space to put your lotions and potions in the bathroom cabinets, and we provide freshly-laundered towels, toiletries, and a hair dryer for your convenience.The airy living room and fully equipped kitchen allow you to feel right at home from the moment you walk in. Whether your idea of a relaxing night includes channeling your inner chef over a delicious home-cooked meal or binging on your latest Netflix show on the huge, 55-inch smart TV, you’ll have plenty of space to do whatever you please.The kitchen is stocked with all the dishes, utensils, and cookware you’d need - whether you’re honing your toast-making skills or whipping up a five-course dinner. Appliances include a stove, oven, full-size fridge and freezer, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. Pull up a chair and dig into your culinary creations at the dining table which seats 6. And you’ll feel like you’re on an episode of Cribs among the gorgeous (and numerous!) cherry-wood cabinetry.So no matter how you choose to spend your time in the Windy City, whether by scarfing down hot dogs at a Cubs game or perusing the art galleries of Downtown Chicago, you’ll have a comfortable, stylish place to begin and end each day.

description: Dapper Uptown Studio near Lake Michigan
name: Apartment in Uptown
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Nala & Owen2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to this beautifully renovated, 200 sq ft studio located in the Uptown neighborhood. This apartment has access to a shared fitness area, backyard/garden, and comfy work station. The building is a block from the Red Line train and is walking distance to neighborhood restaurants, bars, shops, and cafes. This apartment is perfect for remote workers or solo travelers looking to be in a nice neighborhood close to the city! Check in is completely contactless with a keypad & door code.The spaceThis compact studio is located in Uptown and is ideal for solo traveler looking to explore the city, or for remote working in a safe and clean environment. The entire micro-studio has been renovated and tastefully furnished. The bed is queen sized with memory foam mattress. The bathroom has a large walk-in shower and comes with shampoo, conditioner, soap and all towels. The apartment is equipped with a flat screen TV with Roku giving guests access to Netflix, HBO and more. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to prepare a meal. Lastly, if you need to work, there is a foldable desk that guests can use - perfect for a workspace or writing!Guests can use the fitness area downstairs, as well as common area off the shared hallway if needed which includes a larger workspace and lounging area. Guests are also free to enjoy the backyard/garden area that is shared by tenants of the building. There is a BBQ grill, lounge chairs and plenty of space to relax on sunny Chicago day!The Wilson train stop (Red Line) is a block away from the apartment, and is walking distance to beautiful Lake Michigan. Catch a Cubs game at nearby Wrigley Field or take a train to the Loop for some great shops, museums, music venues, famous architecture, and international restaurants.

description: L4. Next to Downtown, best location
name: Private room in McKinley Park
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Mirko1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in January 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Great location and most affordable. This place is located in a very safe neighborhood. Very close to the heart of downtown. 20-25min to Millenium park. Train is 7min walking. a lot of 24/7 free parking on the street. Right in the corner there is a huge super market. 24hours fast food, etc. We provide clean towels, shampoo, coffee, WiFi, hair dryer, etc. Pretty much everything you might need. Very well located in the city and close to the interstate highways.Other things to noteThe room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! The room has one twin size bed and it’s for one guest only. You can book two rooms if you need more people! As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

more description: This studio apartment is in the perfect location in Chicago for getting to Downtown via the Blue Line L or to the Hot West Loop and Randolph street restaurant row.  Walk to bars, shops, restaurants, coffee liquor stores and transportation with ease!  You will love our spa baths, in unit laundry and full modern kitchens to make it feel like a home away from home.  One of the best pizza spots in Chicago is only steps away!The spaceAt 747 Lofts we want to ensure everyone who stays feels like they are at home and can settle right in, so we provide the following amenities to all our guests!  -  Professionally trained cleaners who follow a tightly regimented cleaning and sanitizing checklist. They are equipped with a full complement of professional cleaning tools and chemicals including a hospital-grade disinfectant.- A paid parking lot is located nearby- Elevator building- Fresh towels and linens which are professionally laundered and ironed by a hotel linen company- Wireless internet is always available- TV with streaming options and DirectTV cable- Kitchen appliances including a microwave, drip coffee pot, electric tea kettle and toaster  - We provide artisanal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas.- Our Lofts are FULLY STOCKED with all the amenities of home including Malin and Goetz shampoo, conditioner and body wash, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, sponges & Method brand hand soap and dish soap.  You name it, we provide it to make you feel at home!-The full sized kitchen is stocked with cookware, utensils, glasses, cutlery, sharp knives, cutting boards, baking sheets and all the basic tools like wine openers, cheese graters, vegetable peelers, pizza cutters, etc.  - Hair dryer- Ironing board and Iron- Luggage racks and hangers

description: Modern & Stylish 1BR Apt in the Center of Lakeview
name: Apartment in Lake View
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Brad & Sara2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.  Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment is a perfect place to stay on any Chicago getaway, whether business or vacation. It is professionally designed with a full kitchen, living room, and modern decor.The spaceIn the heart of Lakeview East Chicago, our sophisticated 1 bedroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train to take you south to Downtown or north to Loyola and Evanston.Illuminated by sunny natural light, our studio features King-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!Street parking is limited and it is difficult to park at night, we recommend parking your car once and taking the train for your entire stay. The Wellington L Station is just a 10 minutes walk away

Our trendy unit is perfect for both leisure & business travelers.We are conveniently located between O'hare & Downtown in the very safe Jefferson Park Neighborhood and short distance to Jefferson Park Transit Center (Trains) & Highways.Disclaimer: **We upgraded some of the furniture recently so the difference on the listed photos may be apparent.The space-Professionally designed space with modern furniture. -The entire unit is for your own use. -50" Flat Screen TV in the living room and 32" Flat Screen in the bedroom with Unlimited Netflix streaming.-Brand new Whirlpool stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including French Door Fridge, Microwave, & Stove/Oven Range.-Sleep in a comfortable Full Size bed in the bedroom, a Single Size bed in the Nap Room and additional Twin Bed can be set up per your request.-Basic Dinnerware, Cutlery, Drinking Glasses, and Pots & Pans provided.-We provide towels, toilet paper, and shampoo for your use.-We have shared coin laundry on premise. description: Cool 2BR | Wrigleyville close to Fun City
name: Apartment in Wrigleyville
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Julien4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Are you organizing a thrilling trip to the Windy City or going to a baseball game? Only one block separates our elegant 2-bedroom/1-bath apartment from Wrigley Field. You can experience Chi-Town life as a local by taking advantage of the apartment's conveniences like a full kitchen and quick WiFi.The spaceThe apartment includes 2 private bedroom, which features 2 -queen sized beds, nightstands, a large window, and a closet with hangers. The chic bathroom also has a touch of modern design, and the bathroom fixtures include a sink, toilet, and shower/tub combo. There’s ample space to put your lotions and potions in the bathroom cabinets.The airy living room and fully equipped kitchen allow you to feel right at home from the moment you walk in. There’s also a desk in the living room where you can catch up on emails. The kitchen is stocked with all the dishes, utensils, and cookware you’d need. Appliances include a stove, oven, full-size fridge and freezer, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. So no matter how you choose to spend your time in the Windy City, whether by scarfing down hot dogs at a Cubs game or perusing the art galleries of Downtown Chicago, you’ll have a comfortable, stylish place to begin and end each day.

description: Spacious 2BR Apt with Balcony & WiFi
name: Apartment in Lake View
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Luap And Yval4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: If you love nightlife and festivals, this is the best place for that most-awaited getaway! They always have some neighborhood events as well. So there’s a big chance that you would be able to interact or get to know the locals while staying here. Also, the best place for dog lovers and dog owners alike as there are many dog parks nearby and a popular veterinary clinic on the main road.Everything is within a 5-mile radius. Plus public transportation in this area is really good!The spaceIn the heart of trendy Lakeview Chicago, our sophisticated 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming, quiet neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train to take you south to Downtown or north to Loyola and Evanston.Our apartment features a queen size beds, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!Street parking and meter parking is available nearby. But as it gets more difficult to park at night we recommend parking your car and take the train for your entire stay. The apartment is a 13-minute walk to the Addison train station.

more description: Are you organizing a thrilling trip to the Windy City or going to a baseball game? Only one block separates our elegant 2-bedroom/1-bath apartment from Wrigley Field. You can experience Chi-Town life as a local by taking advantage of the apartment's conveniences like a full kitchen and quick WiFi.The spaceThe apartment includes 2 private bedroom, which features 2 -queen sized beds, nightstands, a large window, and a closet with hangers. The chic bathroom also has a touch of modern design, and the bathroom fixtures include a sink, toilet, and shower/tub combo. There’s ample space to put your lotions and potions in the bathroom cabinets.The airy living room and fully equipped kitchen allow you to feel right at home from the moment you walk in. There’s also a desk in the living room where you can catch up on emails. The kitchen is stocked with all the dishes, utensils, and cookware you’d need. Appliances include a stove, oven, full-size fridge and freezer, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. So no matter how you choose to spend your time in the Windy City, whether by scarfing down hot dogs at a Cubs game or perusing the art galleries of Downtown Chicago, you’ll have a comfortable, stylish place to begin and end each day.

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: My place is close to the Blue Line, the highway, Downtown, Logan Square, Wicker Park, Bucktown, Humbolt Park, and Lincoln Park. You'll love my place because of the central location, free parking, delicious local restaurants, and easy commute to anywhere in the city. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travel, and families with kids. This is a new listing for the same unit I've been hosting for 4 years. Please click on my name and read all my reviews for this space!The spaceHello travelers! Welcome to our home in the city. This is a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom space with an attic loft. There is a queen bed in the bedroom, and two twin beds in the loft. This is a second floor unit located on Western Ave., so there is some noise from the street. It does quiet down at night and the bedroom is towards the rear of the apartment so if you're looking for a city apartment that's minutes from it all, this is the one!There is free street parking on Western Ave. The Blue Line Western stop is just a few blocks south. This is the train that runs from O'hare Airport all the way downtown. If you're driving, the Kennedy Expressway 94 is just 2 blocks north, off the Fullerton exit.There is a secure lock box with 2 keys for easy check-in. We have exterior security cameras for additional security. This also means we can see how many people come in and out of the apartment so please be honest when making your booking as any unapproved guests will be charged the additional guest fee. Any unapproved parties or gatherings will be charged the full security deposit. My husband and I designed and built this unit. We hope you enjoy this simple, cozy, no fuss place that's so close to it all!

unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Chicago)2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Welcome to South Wabash — your modern South Loop sanctuary. Where each sophisticated space includes a fully equipped kitchen, in-suite laundry, and stunning Chicago views. Colorful art pieces complement the industrial exposed concrete ceilings. And floor-to-ceiling windows burst with natural night.

There’s always something to do in the Windy City. Field Museum hosts fascinating exhibitions, Grant Park is perfect for a stroll, and South Michigan Avenue has the best restaurants. Victory Tap is around the corner and “Mama’s Meatballs” will leave your tasetbuds watering. Whether you like jazz, opera, or dive bar karaoke, the South Loop has entertainment for everyone. At South Wabash, the best of the city is on your doorstep.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming
- In-suite laundry
- Fitness center next door

What’s nearby
- 4 minute walk to Victory Tap (Aunt Angie’s Stuffed Shells for the win)
- 4 minute walk to M Lounge (can’t go wrong with the French 75)
- 9 minute walk to Little Branch Cafe (try the breakfast burrito)
- 9 minute walk to Grant Park (great for a leisurely stroll)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.
