description: Dapper Uptown Studio near Lake Michigan
name: Apartment in Uptown
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Nala & Owen2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to this beautifully renovated, 200 sq ft studio located in the Uptown neighborhood. This apartment has access to a shared fitness area, backyard/garden, and comfy work station. The building is a block from the Red Line train and is walking distance to neighborhood restaurants, bars, shops, and cafes. This apartment is perfect for remote workers or solo travelers looking to be in a nice neighborhood close to the city! Check in is completely contactless with a keypad & door code.The spaceThis compact studio is located in Uptown and is ideal for solo traveler looking to explore the city, or for remote working in a safe and clean environment. The entire micro-studio has been renovated and tastefully furnished. The bed is queen sized with memory foam mattress. The bathroom has a large walk-in shower and comes with shampoo, conditioner, soap and all towels. The apartment is equipped with a flat screen TV with Roku giving guests access to Netflix, HBO and more. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to prepare a meal. Lastly, if you need to work, there is a foldable desk that guests can use - perfect for a workspace or writing!Guests can use the fitness area downstairs, as well as common area off the shared hallway if needed which includes a larger workspace and lounging area. Guests are also free to enjoy the backyard/garden area that is shared by tenants of the building. There is a BBQ grill, lounge chairs and plenty of space to relax on sunny Chicago day!The Wilson train stop (Red Line) is a block away from the apartment, and is walking distance to beautiful Lake Michigan. Catch a Cubs game at nearby Wrigley Field or take a train to the Loop for some great shops, museums, music venues, famous architecture, and international restaurants.

description: L4. Next to Downtown, best location
name: Private room in McKinley Park
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Mirko1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in January 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Great location and most affordable. This place is located in a very safe neighborhood. Very close to the heart of downtown. 20-25min to Millenium park. Train is 7min walking. a lot of 24/7 free parking on the street. Right in the corner there is a huge super market. 24hours fast food, etc. We provide clean towels, shampoo, coffee, WiFi, hair dryer, etc. Pretty much everything you might need. Very well located in the city and close to the interstate highways.Other things to noteThe room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! The room has one twin size bed and it’s for one guest only. You can book two rooms if you need more people! As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

more description: This studio apartment is in the perfect location in Chicago for getting to Downtown via the Blue Line L or to the Hot West Loop and Randolph street restaurant row.  Walk to bars, shops, restaurants, coffee liquor stores and transportation with ease!  You will love our spa baths, in unit laundry and full modern kitchens to make it feel like a home away from home.  One of the best pizza spots in Chicago is only steps away!The spaceAt 747 Lofts we want to ensure everyone who stays feels like they are at home and can settle right in, so we provide the following amenities to all our guests!  -  Professionally trained cleaners who follow a tightly regimented cleaning and sanitizing checklist. They are equipped with a full complement of professional cleaning tools and chemicals including a hospital-grade disinfectant.- A paid parking lot is located nearby- Elevator building- Fresh towels and linens which are professionally laundered and ironed by a hotel linen company- Wireless internet is always available- TV with streaming options and DirectTV cable- Kitchen appliances including a microwave, drip coffee pot, electric tea kettle and toaster  - We provide artisanal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas.- Our Lofts are FULLY STOCKED with all the amenities of home including Malin and Goetz shampoo, conditioner and body wash, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, sponges & Method brand hand soap and dish soap.  You name it, we provide it to make you feel at home!-The full sized kitchen is stocked with cookware, utensils, glasses, cutlery, sharp knives, cutting boards, baking sheets and all the basic tools like wine openers, cheese graters, vegetable peelers, pizza cutters, etc.  - Hair dryer- Ironing board and Iron- Luggage racks and hangers

Jewel-Osco is just around the corner, and two blocks away at the intersection of Sheridan Road and Broadway Street, you'll find a variety of restaurants. We provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. more description: Located in lakeview / Wrigleyville this is a Private bedroom in a great location just 6min by walk to Wrigley Field (Cubs Stadium).This neighborhood is pretty safe and nightlife is amazing just few blocks away you will find great bars and restaurants that are open until very late. Accesible public transportation 24/7 (Addison red line just 9 min walking and Southport brown line 6 min far by walk) and just 16 min by car / 23 min by Public transportation to Downtown Chicago.The spaceYou will have a bunk bed (full over full)  in a private bedroom. You will have a combination lock to lock your bedroom. To get in the house or building we use a keypad.Parking is not very easy and it’s not free. You can have a parking permit that will let you park on the street per extra 10$ a night, you will need one ticket every 24 hours and we don’t guarantee parking next to the house. This place has a hostel vibe, so if you enjoy meet new people this is a great place for you. If you enjoy your privacy I’ll recommend you to book an entire place*I only accept payments through Airbnb platform*

more description: Hello!We are located in a beautiful neighborhood called Norwood Park. Please note: this Is a room in a full basement with a kitchen and bathroom that is shared with 2 other Airbnb guests. —————Highlights include:-Beautiful hiking/biking trail nearby-Walking distance to bus stop. -Close to major highways -Downtown Chicago: 12 miles away-O’hare airport, Rosemont, All-State Arena: 3 miles away-Advocate Lutheran Hospital: 5 miles away-Amita Resurrection Health Center: 1.4 miles awayThe spaceThe property is located in a quiet safe neighborhood called Norwood Park. The door to the entrance has a Yale keypad lock so guests can conveniently check in on their own. The room is simple and cozy with a bed, desk, and chair. Nothing fancy. The room may not be the most aesthetically pleasing but it is practical. The room is intended for those who need a place to sleep. Please note: this Is a room in a full basement with a kitchen and bathroom that is shared with 2 other Airbnb guests. Also, the room can get chilly at times but we provide a space heater if needed.Lastly, we live on the 1st floor and have a toddler so you’ll hear some noise above you until 11 pm.

description: L4. Next to Downtown, best location
name: Private room in McKinley Park
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Mirko1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in January 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Great location and most affordable. This place is located in a very safe neighborhood. Very close to the heart of downtown. 20-25min to Millenium park. Train is 7min walking. a lot of 24/7 free parking on the street. Right in the corner there is a huge super market. 24hours fast food, etc. We provide clean towels, shampoo, coffee, WiFi, hair dryer, etc. Pretty much everything you might need. Very well located in the city and close to the interstate highways.Other things to noteThe room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! The room has one twin size bed and it’s for one guest only. You can book two rooms if you need more people! As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

more description: Conveniently situated across the street from Loyola University’s Rogers Park Campus and close to cafés, restaurants and shops, this brand new modern and stylish two bedroom residence presents a new standard in luxurious modern living.About the unit:-2 Bedrooms-2 Bathrooms-Sofa Bed in living room-Tall ceilings-Beautiful natural lighting from large windows-In unit washer/dryerFor those in need of parking, you can rent garage space for $30/night.There is also free bike storage availableThe spaceGuests have access to a 4,000 sqft outdoor space, ideal for families and groups. Gathering around the café tables or large community table. Relax in front of the fire pit with lounge seating or have fun on the ping-pong table. There is also an indoor amenity space available with a communal kitchen and a large table while there’s also a lounge with televisions plus an arcade game and a private conference room with a television. A high-end fitness room complete with basic equipment.Please note that we strictly do not allow ANY PARTIES, GATHERINGS OR OUTSIDE GUESTS WHATSOEVER, apart from the ones registered (even if they're not staying overnight!). If you decide to experience a stay in one of our modern luxurious suites, we require that you respect the rules, the house, and the neighbors, keep noise levels down at all times and note that this is a strictly NO-SMOKING building. name: Private room in Norwood Park
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Victor1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in April 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Hello! Please note: the room is a basement room.Highlights include:-Beautiful hiking/biking trail nearby-Walking distance to bus stop. -Close to major highways (94, 294, etc)-Downtown Chicago: 12 miles away-O’hare airport, Rosemont, All-State Arena: 3 miles away-Advocate Lutheran Hospital: 5 miles away-Amita Resurrection Health Center: 1.4 miles awayThe spacePlease note: this room was intended for those who needed a quick night stay! (For example, for those who have a long layover)***However, the city of Chicago passed an ordinance that requires that guests book a minimum of 2 nights.***The space is simple. No fancy renovations. No fancy designs. It has basic amenities and furnishings. The room is set up so guests have a comfortable place to stay. The place may not be the most aesthetically pleasing but it is practical.It is located in a basement. It may be more chilly than a regular room due to its location although we try to keep the temperatures as warm as possible. There are tenants directly above you. You may hear them walking around. There is no kitchen but a microwave and mini-fridge are available. The bathroom is shared with another guest. The neighborhood is off of a major street but it is safe and relatively quiet.Also, there is an awesome, scenic hiking/biking nearby!!

name: Hotel room in Streeterville
unit rental details: Room in boutique hotel hosted by Freehand1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 shared bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in February 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Join us at Freehand Chicago Hotel for your travels in Chicago. Perfect for travelers here too long for a traditional hotel or for just 1 night.This listing is for one bunk for one person in a shared female-only room with 4 bunks (up to 3 roommates). We have many options such as private standard rooms and private quad rooms.  Please send us a message with any questions.$5 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long-term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.The spaceSomewhere between a hostel and hotel, you'll find the amenities you need to get through anywhere from a week to a few months. This listing is for one twin bunk in a shared room with four total bunks, so you would have up to 3 roommates. The room has a private bathroom and lockers for storing valuables. Each bunk features a curtain for privacy, reading lamp, and power outlet. Linens and towels are included, as is regular housekeeping service. One piece of luggage, one personal item (such as a book bag), and 3-4 hanging items of clothing permitted. For the lockers, guests are welcome to use their own lock or the front desk sells combination padlocks for $5. Please ask the front desk if you need complimentary shampoo, lotion, soap, and/or extra towels.Guest accessBesides your bunk, you will have access to all public spaces and amenities at the hotel including the Broken Shaker cocktail bar.  Coin-operated and valet laundry are available.Other things to noteTo check-in, the hotel requires guests must be 18 or older with a government-issued photo ID. Your room and tax will be prepaid through Airbnb, but the hotel requires a $50 deposit for incidentals on a card at check-in per room, per stay. We do not accept gift cards, prepaid cards, or cash for incidentals. The deposit will be released back to your card at checkout provided you do not charge anything to your room. It takes most banks 3-7 business days to process the release.$5 nightly resort fee plus tax paid at the propertyFor long-term stays, guests must move rooms about every 30 days.License numberR18000024404

name: Condo in Uptown
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Nataliya2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2013**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This is a simple, clean and quiet studio apartment in a gorgeous area. Recent renovation brought a fresh crisp look to the common spaces. The apartment itself received a fresh paint.Weekly and monthly discounts are available.The spaceThis is a studio on the edge of  Lake Michigan. Double bed, full bath,  and full kitchen.   This is a separate apartment - your will have it all for yourself. No shared facilities. 3rd floor. The building is located on a narrow tree lined street. The apartment is overlooking the enclosed courtyard; and so, there is no street noise. A light sleeper would appreciate this fact.    Unique location. A quiet and safe neighborhood, historic Margate Park, part of the Uptown .Plenty of transit options. A couple of blocks to the Red line train. Direct express buses to Chicago downtown right around the corner. 20 minutes to the city center by public transportation and 8 minutes by car.  Direct access to the beach through the underground pathway right across the street. There is a beautiful walking, running, and bike path that leads to miles of activities and relaxation.Historically a very popular tourist destination, the Uptown is home to various music venues, nightclubs, restaurants and shops. It is now experiencing a revival, with new restaurants and shops opening every year. Uptown Square, at the center of the Uptown Entertainment District, was designated as a National Historic District on the National Register of Historic Places in 2000. The host speaks English, Russian, and Ukrainian.What is available:full size bedfull bath100% cotton linens100% cotton towelsHair DryerIronair conditionerovenstovefridgemicrowaveelectric kettle2 coffee makers - regular and espressotoasterblenderdishes and utensilscookwarerice cookersoapshampoo and conditionerbath tissuepaper towelsTea, coffee, sugar TV (Comcast Flex, You can stream 4K movies, play music and more) Wi-Fi

more description: Located in lakeview / Wrigleyville this is a Private bedroom in a great location just 6min by walk to Wrigley Field (Cubs Stadium).This neighborhood is pretty safe and nightlife is amazing just few blocks away you will find great bars and restaurants that are open until very late. You will have a combination lock to lock your bedroom. To get in the house or building we use a keypad.Parking is not very easy and it’s not free. You can have a parking permit that will let you park on the street per extra 10$ a night, you will need one ticket every 24 hours and we don’t guarantee parking next to the house. This place has a hostel vibe, so if you enjoy meet new people this is a great place for you. If you enjoy your privacy I’ll recommend you to book an entire place*I only accept payments through Airbnb platform*

more description: • Steps away from McCormick Place• Michigan Avenue location• 2 shifts Security officers in the building• City view• Queen size bed + Queen size Air mattress for 2 extra guests• Comfortable stay for up to 4 guests at a time• Access to the Gym• Dedicated Internet• 4K smart HDTV(Netflix and Roku)• Fully equipped & stocked kitchen with complimentary Coffee & Tea• Walk to Restaurants and Shopping• Minutes to all touristic destinations• Optional Parking space for only $25/dayThe spaceDesigned with the traveler in mind, this Studio Suite (Sleeps 4) caters all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. The Michigan Suites are thriving with downtown vibes. The suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual Airbnb experience. It is uniquely designed to its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, our suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city.At a Glance:- Michigan avenue location- 1 Queen bed in the unit for the initial two guests + Queen size Air mattress with fresh bedding is provided for extra two guests in case if the reservation is for 4 people- Custom furnishing- Dedicated Internet- In walking distance to the best bars and restaurantsOur McCormick Lofts have  high ceilings and stunning views of the South loop to make your stay the perfect combination of comfort and lifestyle. Our guests enjoy apartment features including beautiful 10-12 ft lofted ceilings, remodeled floors and kitchens. The fitness room comes in especially handy in the winter, complete with cross training, treadmills, and weight sets.Our properties are the top-rated locations in Chicago! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This can be easily checked in our over 1000 reviews.This property is also rated for the best value in Chicago! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in the city.Central Heating and CoolingContemporary KitchensLarge WindowsNew CountertopsLuxury Vinyl TileStainless Steel AppliancesBedroom ClosetsSteps away from McCormick Place and SquareAround 1 mile to South of Museum CampusEasy Access to Lakefront and Grant ParkEasy Access to Local ExpresswaysEasy Access to Public TransportationWalkscore: 92Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: How far away are you from....A: McCormick? 7-9 min walkThe nearest Subway station? 5-6 min walkSoldier Field? 5 min uber Museum Campus? 7min uberDowntown? 8 min uberQ: PARKING?A: We have an optional parking spot for our renters for only $25/dayQ: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! We provide all these things. We also provide you with a starter pack of toilet papers, individually wrapped toothbrushes, individual toothpastes. Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 11am. Early check-ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses an algorithm to adjust it automatically.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Very. Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on and asked us where we bought the mattresses from.

more description: Hello! Please note: the room is a basement room.Highlights include:-Beautiful hiking/biking trail nearby-Walking distance to bus stop. -Close to major highways (94, 294, etc)-Downtown Chicago: 12 miles away-O’hare airport, Rosemont, All-State Arena: 3 miles away-Advocate Lutheran Hospital: 5 miles away-Amita Resurrection Health Center: 1.4 miles awayThe spacePlease note: this room was intended for those who needed a quick night stay! (For example, for those who have a long layover)***However, the city of Chicago passed an ordinance that requires that guests book a minimum of 2 nights.***The space is simple. No fancy renovations. No fancy designs. It has basic amenities and furnishings. The room is set up so guests have a comfortable place to stay. The place may not be the most aesthetically pleasing but it is practical.It is located in a basement. It may be more chilly than a regular room due to its location although we try to keep the temperatures as warm as possible. There are tenants directly above you. You may hear them walking around. There is no kitchen but a microwave and mini-fridge are available. The bathroom is shared with another guest. The neighborhood is off of a major street but it is safe and relatively quiet.Also, there is an awesome, scenic hiking/biking nearby!!

more description: About this spaceWelcome to Chicago! Enjoy the Windy City while staying in our cozy, ergonomically designed home. Whether you are traveling for business or vacation, our private guest space has all of the amenities to make you feel at home!Our lovely 2-bedroom apartment is professionally designed with modern furniture, a spacious living room, a fully furnished kitchen and bathroom. Your ideal accommodation for a perfect getaway.The spaceOur apartment features 2 bedrooms with king-size beds, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room!The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, tub, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!**AC: We remove the window air conditioner before the winter comes. This prevents cold air from entering during cold weather and protects the window unit from damage caused by snow and ice.**

description: ✨Spacious Centrally Located West Loop Loft✨
name: Apartment in West Loop
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Bridget6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✔ FREE STREET PARKING *1 car within 2 blocks*✔ HUGE 1300 sq ft loft.✔ CLEAN & sanitized ✔ FULLY AIRED OUT between guests.✔ Cozy & bright.✔ FAMED, historic Chicago pink brick.✔ FREE COFFEE & TEAS✔ Soap & other toiletries included.✔ Bedrooms are in back & quiet.✔ PETS ok w/ prior approval.✔ Fully furnished along w/ pretty much anything you'd ever need.✔ You can't find a more central location:     -Close to trains & bus     -6-10 mins away from popular neighborhoods & hot restaurantsThe space✔ FREE STREET PARKING! You are in a major city, so don't expect to park right in front every time. You will have to circle a bit at times and park up to 3 blocks away. Don't forget that parking around the city is difficult and expensive. I wouldn't recommend it for newcomers.✔ DEDICATED PARKING SPOT IN BACK from 9p-8a. You must walk around the block to get in from this spot. It is used by the business from 8a-9p. Please park as close to the wall as possible so other cars may fit.✔ HISTORY - This 1300 sq ft loft is located in a building built in 1890, and features Historical "Chicago Brick."✔ HIGH CEILINGS & EXPOSED VENTS - BUT NOT A TRUE LOFT. The walls go all the way to the ceiling in the bedrooms and bathrooms so there is more privacy than a true loft.✔ TONS of natural light, but curtains if you need less light✔ Hardwood floors throughout, ceramic tile in bathrooms✔ Custom painted artwork on walls✔ SIZE - The apartment is honestly huge. It feels so bright and spacious with it's tall ceilings and open layout for common areas, which is great for hanging out. It is VERY comfortable to have 6 people here at once✔ CLEAN - I've lived here 10 years and always keep it clean to maintain the charm of it all.✔ SECOND FLOOR - The loft is on the second floor✔ LOCATION - One of the most centrally located areas you can find.

description: McCormick Place Studio/parking/sleeps up to 4
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Milan4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: • Steps away from McCormick Place• Michigan Avenue location• 2 shifts Security officers in the building• City view• Queen size bed + Queen size Air mattress for 2 extra guests• Comfortable stay for up to 4 guests at a time• Access to the Gym• Dedicated Internet• 4K smart HDTV(Netflix and Roku)• Fully equipped & stocked kitchen with complimentary Coffee & Tea• Walk to Restaurants and Shopping• Minutes to all touristic destinations• Optional Parking space for only $25/dayThe spaceDesigned with the traveler in mind, this Studio Suite (Sleeps 4) caters all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. The Michigan Suites are thriving with downtown vibes. The suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual Airbnb experience. It is uniquely designed to its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, our suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city.At a Glance:- Michigan avenue location- 1 Queen bed in the unit for the initial two guests + Queen size Air mattress with fresh bedding is provided for extra two guests in case if the reservation is for 4 people- Custom furnishing- Dedicated Internet- In walking distance to the best bars and restaurantsOur McCormick Lofts have  high ceilings and stunning views of the South loop to make your stay the perfect combination of comfort and lifestyle. Our guests enjoy apartment features including beautiful 10-12 ft lofted ceilings, remodeled floors and kitchens. The fitness room comes in especially handy in the winter, complete with cross training, treadmills, and weight sets.Our properties are the top-rated locations in Chicago! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This can be easily checked in our over 1000 reviews.This property is also rated for the best value in Chicago! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in the city.Central Heating and CoolingContemporary KitchensLarge WindowsNew CountertopsLuxury Vinyl TileStainless Steel AppliancesBedroom ClosetsSteps away from McCormick Place and SquareAround 1 mile to South of Museum CampusEasy Access to Lakefront and Grant ParkEasy Access to Local ExpresswaysEasy Access to Public TransportationWalkscore: 92Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: How far away are you from....A: McCormick? 7-9 min walkThe nearest Subway station? 5-6 min walkSoldier Field? 5 min uber Museum Campus? 7min uberDowntown? 8 min uberQ: PARKING?A: We have an optional parking spot for our renters for only $25/dayQ: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! We provide all these things. We also provide you with a starter pack of toilet papers, individually wrapped toothbrushes, individual toothpastes. Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 11am. Early check-ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses an algorithm to adjust it automatically.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Very. Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on and asked us where we bought the mattresses from.

description: 10% Winter Promo! 3BR Comfy Apt in Logan Square
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Inca And Chris6 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in December 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy the Windy City while staying in our cozy, ergonomically designed home. Whether you are traveling for business or vacation, our private guest space has all of the amenities to make you feel like Avondale & Logan Square are your home!   This lovely 3-bedroom apartment is conveniently located to a variety of walkable places for a relaxing Chicago adventure. It is professionally designed and furnished with contemporary fixtures.   An ideal accommodation for your perfect getaway!The spaceOur airy three-bedroom space in the heart of Logan Square’s artsy neighborhood is your home in this side of the city. Be it a work trip to close a business deal or a much-awaited holiday breather, our unit is equipped with basic toiletries, cozy furniture and brand new appliances to comfortably accommodate a party of six. Whether you’d like to cozy up and stay in or explore our bustling neighborhood, the unit’s accessible location is your jump off to whatever Logan Square adventure would you like to pursue.The apartment includes 2 full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor. The entire place has free, fast Wi-Fi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!**AC: We remove the window air conditioner before the winter comes. This prevents cold air from entering during cold weather and protects the window unit from damage caused by snow and ice.**

Easy access to public transportation, downtown Chicago, i290, West Loop, Taylor St, and more!Guest access-Corner of the condo bus #157 straight to Polk pink line (9 minutes) or #49 to western blue line (8 minutes)-Not to mention we're just a 25 min walk/7min drive to the United Center (Home of the Chicago Bulls and Blackhawks). -Divvy bikes available across the street -Free street parking

more description: Portage Park is a vibrant neighborhood with numerous bakeries and flower shops.This residential area is surrounded by three distinct shopping districts, one of which is known as Six Corners. Six Corners is an outdoor shopping area with boutiques and retailers inspired by Europe. Residents can travel easily using the Blue Line transit system, as well as Interstates 90 and 94. The nearest airport is O'Hare International Airport, which is nine miles away.The spaceOur one-bedroom private home has one queen bed and a closet with hangers and iron.Our chic bathroom with a touch of modern design features a sink, toilet, and shower.The spacious living room and fully equipped kitchen make you feel at ease the moment you walk in. There is also a desk in the living room where you can catch up on emails.The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, utensils, and cookware. A stove, oven, full-size refrigerator, toaster, and coffee maker are among the appliances.**Wi-Fi will be available soon.**

more description: Located in the heart of Gold Coast, Chicago's most sought after neighborhood.Please enjoy our large, brand new rehabbed apartment unit with an amazing open floor plan. The unit offers a brand new updated kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom and a beautiful lobby and hallways. The building offers amazing amenities including a pool on the 24th floor rooftop, patio furniture with grills on the rooftop, a brand new rehabbed gym and study space.The spaceThe bedroom includes a large King Bed that can sleep three if needed. We have an amazing Crate & Barrel sofa bed in the living room that folds out into a queen size bed that can be made with fresh clean linen and a comforter with extra pillows. We also supply a queen size air mattress. Gold Coast is home to some of the best restaurants in Chicago RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET FROM OUR BUILDING. Enjoy Tavern on Rush, Gibsons Steak, and many more steps away.

more description: This below-grade unit has everything you want! Nestled on a quiet tree-lined street public transport is close by and downtown is a quick car ride away. The condo has lots of space and all the amenities you can ask for - plenty of parking, a King sized bed with premium linens, a luxury memory foam mattress, walk-in closet to store all your things, double spa shower, and a coffee bar stocked with top shelf Nespresso coffee. This unit books up quickly, so grab it today!The spaceThis is the lower level of a condo, no spaces are shared. There is a living area with a couch that converts to a full size bed,  microwave, refrigerator,  coffee bar stocked with Nespresso coffee, dining room, bedroom with a king sized bed and oversized bathroom with a spa double shower. This unit features a private entrance with an individual Nest thermostat for you to adjust the temperature. Early check-in is available for an additional fee, please message the host for information. Well-behaved pets are welcome. Please message the host directly prior to booking if you would like to bring your furry friend.

name: Private room in Oak Park
unit rental details: Private room in home hosted by Michael And Ling2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 2 shared baths
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 2 shared baths**__**Joined in October 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to our beautiful, classic Oak Park house! This is only 1 room within our house, NOT the entire house. Other rooms are shared with other guests and the host.Quiet & upscale suburbs. Close to public trans & I-290 exprwy. 15 min to downtown via train & 15 min by car (normal traffic). Close to Loyola Med Ctr and Hines VA & Rush Hsptls.Other things to noteAlteration RequestOccasionally, the host may send the guest(s) an Alteration Request.  Such Alteration Requests may be to just change the booked room to a similar room, or upgrade a booked room to a nicer room. Sometimes the Alteration Request does not involve a room change, but simply just an alignment adjustment of our internal booking calendar. We reward your cooperation with a FREE UPGRADE in such circumstances.  In the event a room upgrade is not available, we may provide a significant room rate reduction. This allows us to accommodate needed guest extensions or necessary room adjustments due to various situations. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in accepting any Alteration Request as soon as possible. ReviewWe try our utmost to make your stay comfortable and satisfactory. It is most helpful if you notify us immediately of any issues that need attention, and we will give our best effort to rectify them. We also welcome you to provide direct comments or suggestions to the host as this is more timely and effective. On rare occasions, some guests like to serve as an inspector and write a lengthy but improper review in public without any communication with the host.  We have no choice but to spend time responding to such reviews on the same forum or contact Airbnb to address the review when warranted. We really do not want to waste our time on such matters. We appreciate the many wonderful reviews on our hosting service, and that is very rewarding to all people who are involved in making your stay comfortable. The star rating standard set by Airbnb is very high. We appreciate that most guests give us very generous reviews and we are able to maintain productive working relationship with Airbnb.

description: McCormick Pl Stylish corner unit/parking/sleeps 6
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Milan6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: • Steps away from McCormick Place• Michigan Avenue location• 2 shifts Security officers in the building• 2 Queen size beds + Queen size Air mattress for 2 extra guests• Comfortable stay for up to 6 guests at a time• Access to the Gym in the building• Fast dedicated Internet• 4K smart HDTV(Netflix and Roku)• Fully equipped & stocked kitchen with complimentary Coffee & Tea• Close to Restaurants and Shopping• Minutes to all touristic destinations• Optional Parking space for only $25/dayThe spaceDesigned with the traveler in mind, this two bedroom corner Suite (Sleeps 6) caters all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. The Michigan Suites are thriving with downtown vibes. This suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual Airbnb experience. Each room is uniquely designed to its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, our suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city. At a Glance:- Michigan avenue location- 2 Queen size beds in the unit for the initial four guests + Queen size Air mattress with fresh bedding is provided for extra two guests in case if the reservation is for 6 people- Custom furnishing- Fast Internet- In walking distance to the best bars and restaurantsOur McCormick Lofts have  high ceilings and stunning views of the South loop to make your stay the perfect combination of comfort and lifestyle.Our guests enjoy apartment features including beautiful 10-12 ft ceilings, remodeled floors and kitchens. The fitness room comes in especially handy in the winter, complete with cross training, treadmills, and weight sets.Our properties are the top-rated locations in Chicago! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This can be easily checked in our over 1000 reviews.This property is also rated for the best value in Chicago! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in the city.Central Heating and CoolingContemporary KitchensLarge WindowsNew CountertopsLuxury Vinyl TileStainless Steel AppliancesBedroom ClosetsSteps away from McCormick Place and SquareAround 1 mile to South of Museum CampusEasy Access to Lakefront and Grant ParkEasy Access to Local ExpresswaysEasy Access to Public TransportationWalkscore: 92Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: How far away are you from....A: McCormick? 9 min walkThe nearest Subway station? 5-6 min walkSoldier Field? 5 min uber Museum Campus? 7min uberDowntown? 8 min uberQ: PARKING?A: We have an optional parking spot for our renters for only $25/dayQ: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! We provide all these things. We also provide you with a starter pack of toilet papers, individually wrapped toothbrushes, individual toothpastes. Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 11am. Early check-ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses an algorithm to adjust it automatically.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Very. Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on and asked us where we bought the mattresses from.

more description: Newly renovated huge 1-level apartment in the very best part of Bucktown.  High end appliances, eat-in kitchen, outdoor space, finished tub, new vanity, in-unit laundry, apple TV's, cable, very high-speed internet. The street-parking is so available on this block, it's breathtaking.The spaceBedroom 1 - Full size velvet day bed (Restoration Hardware) with premium mattress and linens, mini-crib (Land of Nod/Crate and Barrel) with premium organic mattress, storage cubbies, closet, TV, apple TV, ceiling fan, noise machine, lights on dimmers, wood blinds.Bedroom 2 - full-over-full bunk bed (Crate & Barrel), tall dresser, closet, wood blinds. Bathroom - refinished clawfoot tub- original to the building - 1800's, new vanity and faucet, plenty of storage. Kitchen - gut renovation in 2018 - white Shaker cabinets, hand scraped espresso bamboo plank floors, premium appliances, garbage disposal, ligthts on dimmers, kitchen table with seating for four including 2 folding chairs in utility room, flooded with light. Living room - desk, chair, sectional sofa (Crate and Barrel), big leather chair and ottoman, lamps, extra quilts, TV, cable TV, apple TV, very fast internet, nesting tables.Back deck - overlooks turf back yard with shared outdoor dining furniture.

description: Boho Chic 1 BD with Cali King
name: Condo in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Kyriako4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Whether you are staying for a couple nights or a couple weeks this Garden unit is ready to take your breath away. Its been remodeled with all the best finishing's and appliances. You'll have a private entrance to the unit and the entire space is yours to enjoy.  You'll be minutes from downtown, or stick around the Pilsen neighborhood and enjoy the exciting night life blocks away. With an in unit washer/dryer, Nespresso machine, and Cali King size bed we have you covered all around.The spaceThe bedroom has a dedicated work space for those who work and travel. Once you're done answering emails you'll be able to get some R&R on the California King bed with pillow top mattress we have. The walk-in closet has enough space for all your luggage and clothes no matter how long the stay.After waking up in the morning you have the option of a drip coffee machine, or a brand new Nespresso coffee machine to enjoy and help kick start your day. Finish your coffee and eat your breakfast on the all marble island, or relax on the couch while you watch the news or catch up on your favorite streaming show. The in-unit washer and dryer is perfect for those staying awhile. Your outfit will be clean and fresh.While getting ready in the bathroom you'll have plenty of space to move and you'll be getting ready in style with the gorgeous finishing's we had put in. The bathroom is also fully equipped with a standing shower.The unit is monitored by a Minut noise detection device. This device measures how loud it gets in the unit and motion to see how many people are in the unit. This specifically is put in to avoid parties, large gatherings, and to make sure guest don’t get too loud in the unit.

more description: This spacious 3-bedroom apartment in Bucktown is located close to establishments and parks in a great neighbourhood. This cozy three-bedroom, one-bathroom home is perfect for families or smaller groups, making it the perfect destination for your upcoming vacation.Other things to note-All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay as there are other tenants at the property.-Avoid congregating in the public areas inside the building. When necessary, please make sure to wear a mask.-Bath towels are provided per number of guests, not per number of stays.-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message if you need them, and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.-We have duvet covers on our bedding (no top sheets).-Government ID, Security Deposit, and further screening may be required on the following bookings.1) Last minute bookings2) Short weekend stays3) Large groups4) Guests with no reviews5) Guests with an incomplete profile6) Instant Bookings7) Some properties may not allow locals for short-term reservations.MAIL AND PACKAGE DELIVERY-We discourage direct delivery to the building/apartment as we have had lost deliveries in the past. It is recommended to make use of a nearby pickup/drop-off location to guarantee receipt of your mail/package.-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it to us in real-time so we can address it right away.Thank you for entrusting our apartment to be your place in the city when you travel, and we hope to see you soon.

description: ✨Spacious Centrally Located West Loop Loft✨
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Bridget6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✔ FREE STREET PARKING *1 car within 2 blocks*✔ HUGE 1300 sq ft loft.✔ CLEAN & sanitized ✔ FULLY AIRED OUT between guests.✔ Cozy & bright.✔ FAMED, historic Chicago pink brick.✔ FREE COFFEE & TEAS✔ Soap & other toiletries included.✔ Bedrooms are in back & quiet.✔ PETS ok w/ prior approval.✔ Fully furnished along w/ pretty much anything you'd ever need.✔ You can't find a more central location:     -Close to trains & bus     -6-10 mins away from popular neighborhoods & hot restaurantsThe space✔ FREE STREET PARKING! You are in a major city, so don't expect to park right in front every time. You will have to circle a bit at times and park up to 3 blocks away. Don't forget that parking around the city is difficult and expensive. I wouldn't recommend it for newcomers.✔ DEDICATED PARKING SPOT IN BACK from 9p-8a. You must walk around the block to get in from this spot. It is used by the business from 8a-9p. Please park as close to the wall as possible so other cars may fit.✔ HISTORY - This 1300 sq ft loft is located in a building built in 1890, and features Historical "Chicago Brick."✔ HIGH CEILINGS & EXPOSED VENTS - BUT NOT A TRUE LOFT. The walls go all the way to the ceiling in the bedrooms and bathrooms so there is more privacy than a true loft.✔ TONS of natural light, but curtains if you need less light✔ Hardwood floors throughout, ceramic tile in bathrooms✔ Custom painted artwork on walls✔ SIZE - The apartment is honestly huge. It feels so bright and spacious with it's tall ceilings and open layout for common areas, which is great for hanging out. It is VERY comfortable to have 6 people here at once✔ CLEAN - I've lived here 10 years and always keep it clean to maintain the charm of it all.✔ SECOND FLOOR - The loft is on the second floor✔ LOCATION - One of the most centrally located areas you can find.

description: 10% Winter Promo! Stunning Solo/Couple 1BR Wi-Fi
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Brad & Sara2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with everything you need to live.Welcome to Chicago! Our large 1-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment is a perfect place to stay on any Chicago getaway, whether business or vacation. It is professionally designed with a full kitchen, living room, and modern decor.The spaceIn the heart of Lakeview East Chicago, our sophisticated 1BR apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train to take you south to Downtown or north to Loyola and Evanston.Illuminated by sunny natural light, our apartment features a king-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor. The entire place has free, fast Wi-Fi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!Street parking is limited and it is difficult to park at night, we recommend parking your car once and taking the train for your entire stay. The Wellington L Station is just a 10 minutes walk away.

description: Industrial Style Chicago Loft with FREE parking
name: Loft in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Dasha & Owen2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy Chicago in this beautifully renovated one bedroom loft with a chic, industrial vibe. Drink your morning coffee on the private outdoor deck or sleep in late on the California king sized bed. The loft’s lovely art deco ceiling, exposed brick walls and free Netflix are just some of the great features you’ll love. Free parking is included and you’ll be just a 10 minute drive from catching a game at Wrigley Field as well as a 15-20 minute drive to the airport and main downtown attractions.The spaceWelcome to our brand new retreat in the city. This loft was designed and remodeled to perfection taking into consideration every detail you need to enjoy your vacation in Chicago. Featuring a private outdoor deck and an entertaining area with a smart TV. The fully equipped kitchen offers stainless steel appliances such as stovetop and oven, microwave and full-sized refrigerator as well as basic cooking tools and supplies. The dining table by the window is perfect for a couple’s breakfast. In the bedroom you will find an extremely comfortable california king sized bed with a memory foam mattress and clean sheets. The pampering bathroom features a large shower with a rainfall shower head, a hair-dryer as well as complimentary toiletries and clean towels. Additional amenities include self-controlled A/C and closet space with hangers, an iron and ironing board. This loft is very well kept, professionally cleaned and sanitized after each and every use.

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Chicago)4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Welcome to South Wabash — your modern South Loop sanctuary. Where each sophisticated space includes a fully equipped kitchen, in-suite laundry, and stunning Chicago views. Colorful art pieces complement the industrial exposed concrete ceilings. And floor-to-ceiling windows burst with natural night.

There’s always something to do in the Windy City. Field Museum hosts fascinating exhibitions, Grant Park is perfect for a stroll, and South Michigan Avenue has the best restaurants. Victory Tap is around the corner and “Mama’s Meatballs” will leave your tasetbuds watering. Whether you like jazz, opera, or dive bar karaoke, the South Loop has entertainment for everyone. At South Wabash, the best of the city is on your doorstep.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming
- In-suite laundry
- Fitness center next door

What’s nearby
- 4 minute walk to Victory Tap (Aunt Angie’s Stuffed Shells for the win)
- 4 minute walk to M Lounge (can’t go wrong with the French 75)
- 9 minute walk to Little Branch Cafe (try the breakfast burrito)
- 9 minute walk to Grant Park (great for a leisurely stroll)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description: This studio apartment is in the perfect location in Chicago for getting to Downtown via the Blue Line L or to the Hot West Loop and Randolph street restaurant row.  Walk to bars, shops, restaurants, coffee liquor stores and transportation with ease!  You will love our spa baths, in unit laundry and full modern kitchens to make it feel like a home away from home.  One of the best pizza spots in Chicago is only steps away!The spaceAt 747 Lofts we want to ensure everyone who stays feels like they are at home and can settle right in, so we provide the following amenities to all our guests!  -  Professionally trained cleaners who follow a tightly regimented cleaning and sanitizing checklist. They are equipped with a full complement of professional cleaning tools and chemicals including a hospital-grade disinfectant.- A paid parking lot is located nearby- Elevator building- Fresh towels and linens which are professionally laundered and ironed by a hotel linen company- Wireless internet is always available- TV with streaming options and DirectTV cable- Kitchen appliances including a microwave, drip coffee pot, electric tea kettle and toaster  - We provide artisanal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas.- Our Lofts are FULLY STOCKED with all the amenities of home including Malin and Goetz shampoo, conditioner and body wash, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, sponges & Method brand hand soap and dish soap. Outside the bedroom is an open study, and opposite, a leisure/TV area. The leisure area has a love seat that pulls out to a bed. There is an additional pullout love seat in the sitting/study area.These two spaces are separated by an open oak banistered stairwell.  Add an airy kitchen  and an outside deck with seating through the kitchen's french doors. There is also a sleeping loft above the queen. Would be suitable for a teen or someone fit to climb a ladder straight up.

more description: Welcome to our Chicago Speakeasy-style loft space. Built in the early 1900s, our two-floor loft provides a unique experience in the heart of River North/downtown Chicago. Centrally located River North Chicago is a go-to district with lively night scene, and a wide variety of restaurants, bars and clubs. There are many public transit stations within walking distance. ALREADY BOOKED??? If this room is unavailable, check out my profile to see our other listings!  Feel free to message me!The spaceWe Supply a king bed, multiple pillows and the fine linens.  Your room number is 3A, a beautiful and cozy bedroom with 12 foot ceilings, filled with unique artwork.  A nice and quiet room, perfect for light sleepers.In-room bathroom with shower, supplied with towels, robes, soaps, shampoos, conditioners and lotions.We conduct daily upkeep in the common areas including the kitchen, living room, foyer etc.

description: Cozy and Comfy 1BR Apartment in Logan Square!
name: Apartment in Logan Square
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Joan2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Chicago! Our 1-bedroom/1 bathroom apartment unit is perfect for getaway to Chicago. It's professionally designed with modern furniture that gives welcome feeling! We're located in Trendy Logan SquareDesignated parking spot is NOT available, but there is plenty of street parking available.NOTE: This is a basement unit with a low ceiling ( HEIGHT: 5.9 ft.). ONLY SUITABLE FOR SOMEONE AROUND or UNDER 5.8 FT.The spaceIlluminated by sunny natural light, our 1BR features a King-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free, fast WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a mini-fridge , gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!Note: This space does not have its own thermostat to control the temperature. It is automatically set to 72 degrees. If it gets too hot or cold, we ask you crack open a window. If it's not hot or cold enough, please contact us and we can adjust the temperature accordingly.

more description: Host has been fully vaccinated. I clean all rooms to CDC guidelines. TV  just added in bedroom, with Roku streaming stick. Close to UIC and medical district. more description: House trained dogs now allowed with a $100 pet fee! Open for extended stays, essential travelers, and essential business! NO PARTIES, NO SMOKING OR ADDITIONAL GUESTS!My newly remodeled building sits within the heart of the neighborhood. True to this statement, my place is a short two-block walk from the mecca of authentic Mexican Dining, Culture, & Shopping. Many businesses are still open and operational. I would suggest supporting a few during your stay.The spaceFor your privacy, you have an entire 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom downstairs apartment to yourself. Additionally, as the apartment is located on the bottom floor of a 2-flat building, you have a private entrance to come and go. For your convenience, there is free Wi-Fi, a 42" Amazon Smart TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with pots, pans, plates, silverware and a Keurig. You are welcome to cook in the kitchen and enjoy meals during your stay seated at the Kitchen Island.For your comfort, towels, soap, conditioner, shampoo, and a hairdryer are provided within the bathroom.For your peace of mind, the apartment is professionally cleaned after each stay. Additionally, there are cleaning supplies and cleaning tools left within the apartment should you wish to sanitize further or leave the place as you found it.

more description: Enjoy a fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live. We are about a 3 minute drive or approximately a 13 minute walk away from Wrigley Field! Welcome to our unique city of Chicago! Our cozy 1-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment is a perfect place to stay on any Chicago getaway, whether business or vacation. It is professionally designed with a full kitchen, comfortable mattress for much needed rest, and modern decor!The spaceWelcome to the Windy City! Our cozy chic 1 bed/1 bath is professionally designed and fully furnished for your comfort! You’ll have access to WiFi, a full kitchen, tv, and everything you need to enjoy your extended stay in our gorgeous city.Our place is a 3 minute drive or short walk (13 minutes) from Wrigley Field where you can watch a game during baseball season, or enjoy holiday fun at the Wrigleyville Christkindl Market.Whether you’re visiting Chicago for business or vacation, we’d love to host you!

more description: Lakeview is home to Wrigleyville, Wrigley field home of the Chicago Cubs and Belmont theatre district which has over 30 theatres and live performance venues near the “L” station. Very trendy and lively neighborhood yet the apartment is located on a relaxing and quiet steet.Fun fact: In 2013, Money Magazine named Lakeview as number 3 of its top 10 Big-city neighborhoods for its selection of Best Places to Live.Guest access-During your stay at our apartment you will have full and private access to the entire apartment located in the ground unit (Apt GN). You will not have access to other common areas of the apartment building. -**Do not knock on any of our neighbors’ doors. Our door has a brown screen door and the door to get inside the apartment is white. Do not try to access any other doors in the building.-There is free street parking on Hermitage Ave on a first come first serve basis. Please be sure to read all the street signs, tow zones, before parking to avoid tickets and tows.

description: Industrial Style Chicago Loft with FREE parking
name: Loft in Irving Park
unit rental details: Entire loft hosted by Dasha & Owen2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy Chicago in this beautifully renovated one bedroom loft with a chic, industrial vibe. Drink your morning coffee on the private outdoor deck or sleep in late on the California king sized bed. The loft’s lovely art deco ceiling, exposed brick walls and free Netflix are just some of the great features you’ll love. Free parking is included and you’ll be just a 10 minute drive from catching a game at Wrigley Field as well as a 15-20 minute drive to the airport and main downtown attractions.The spaceWelcome to our brand new retreat in the city. This loft was designed and remodeled to perfection taking into consideration every detail you need to enjoy your vacation in Chicago. Featuring a private outdoor deck and an entertaining area with a smart TV. The fully equipped kitchen offers stainless steel appliances such as stovetop and oven, microwave and full-sized refrigerator as well as basic cooking tools and supplies. The dining table by the window is perfect for a couple’s breakfast. In the bedroom you will find an extremely comfortable california king sized bed with a memory foam mattress and clean sheets. The pampering bathroom features a large shower with a rainfall shower head, a hair-dryer as well as complimentary toiletries and clean towels. Additional amenities include self-controlled A/C and closet space with hangers, an iron and ironing board. This loft is very well kept, professionally cleaned and sanitized after each and every use.

Theatres, shopping, great restaurants, nightlife, parks and Lake Michigan are all nearby!The spaceThis luxurious suite creates the perfect centerpiece for any trip to Chicago, whether for business, pleasure, or both. Not only will you have an incredible view day and night, you will also be centrally located in a hub of all that Chicago has to offer in sightseeing, nightlife, arts, and entertainment.  The unit is located in the heart of the city, very close to Michigan Ave., in a haven that has a reputation for being eclectic, interesting, artistic and tightly-woven.This magnificent building also features a pool, lounge, business center, and more. more description: Chicago's Cragin neighborhood, sometimes known as Belmont-Cragin, is located just over nine miles northwest of Downtown Chicago. Cragin, a previous hub of Chicago manufacturing that is now eight miles from the Loop, offers both a suburban pace of life and city advantages. There are many individually owned restaurants, bars, and coffee shops all throughout neighborhood's accessible layout.The spaceOur Cragin one bedroom, one bathroom apartment provides with heat and water, a large living area, hardwood floors, an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher, a huge bedroom with lots of closet space, an updated bathroom, and a laundry room in the building.

more description: Walk to Bucktown & Wicker Park bars, restaurants & shopping from this large apartment in working artists' building. 5 minute WALK  to CTA Blue line TRAIN.  FREE STREET PARKING.  Premium mattresses and all essentials provided. Resident artists work on the first floor of this historic former telephone repair and switching station.  Very laid back vibe.The spaceLarge  one bedroom loft space is a great place to call home and relax after exploring all this location has to offer. Premium queen mattress in bedroom, pull out couch  and large & comfy 2nd  couch  for 5th guest. Full kitchen with cooking essentials,  coffee makers ( American and European) & coffee, cream and sugar. Washer and dryer in unit. Free  wifi, central heat & air conditioning. Street parking is free - no permit required. ( Please know if you are animal sensitive  that dogs and cats live in other loft spaces in the building -  but not in this unit).

more description: Our apartment is located in a family-friendly neighborhood  that has easy access to major highways and public transportation.  People travel throughout the neighborhood by walk and by bicycle. Ravenswood is home to a variety of funky, hip, and stylish restaurants, bars, and coffee shops, such as Band of Bohemia on North Ravenswood Avenue. The spaceOur home has one bedroom and one bathroom, heat and water included, a refurbished kitchen with modern cabinets, stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, and a microwave, wood flooring throughout, dining room, a main living room, a renovated bathroom with ceramic tile, and a laundry room on the premises. Parks, stores, dining establishments, and transportation options are nearby.**AC: We remove the window air conditioner before the winter comes. This prevents cold air from entering during cold weather and protects the window unit from damage caused by snow and ice.**

description: Bright Condo near the Lincoln Park Zoo
name: Condo in Lincoln Park
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Heather4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2012**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: You will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home in the desirable East Lincoln Park neighborhood.Our dream location is THE place to be - next to restaurants, nightlife, transportation, and entertainment.Walk to the the Lincoln Park Zoo (0.5 miles), Lakefront (0.7 miles), and the North Pond Nature trails (0.1). Located on a quiet street steps from scores of restaurants.The living room functions as a combo 2nd bedroom with a privacy curtain and queen bed.The spaceExperience Chicago like a local, while using the home as your launching pad to explore all Chicago has to offer.  This is a 1 bedroom condo on the top floor of a vintage Lincoln Park building.1st BedroomThis bedroom has a Queen bed.Living/ 2nd BedroomThe living room has been set up as a combo living room-second bedroom with a seating area and a Queen bed. A curtain separates this room from the rest of the apartment. You can use the apps on the TV to log into your streaming platforms.WIFI + WorkShould you need to get work done during your visit, the apartment has two desks and wifi.Dining Room/ Kitchen/OfficeThe combination dining room / kitchen / office has a desk, counter dining and all the essential utensils to make a meal. It is stocked with salt, pepper, oil and a drip coffee maker.FamiliesFor those traveling with youngsters, a pack-in-play is provided.Climate ControlThe home has window AC units in the summer. Radiators heat the home in the winter.LaundryA coin-operated laundry room is located in the building. $0.75 to wash and $0.75 to dry.Parking Free street parking is available in the neighborhood. If you prefer off-street parking, the hospital garage a 1/2 block away at 2515 N Clark St has paid parking.PetsPets are considered on a case by case  basis with a pet fee and *must* be given advanced authorization to be at the property *before* booking. Please be sure your pet is listed in the guest count. A $250 fine will be assessed if any pets are found on the property without prior authorization. I would love to host you! Send me a message with any additional questions you may have. ♡ Heather FAQ'sQ:  Do you offer early check-in or late check-outs?A:  We use this precious little time we have between guests to prepare the home following the CDC Cleaning Guidelines, as well as to complete any maintenance tasks, so your stay is uninterrupted. If you request an early check-in or late check-out, we will try to accommodate if possible but cannot confirm until a day or two ahead. If additional time is important, we recommend booking an additional night to your stay.Q:  Do you allow luggage drop-off for early arrivals or late departures?A:  We are unable to guarantee the availability of luggage drop-off, but will accommodate when possible.Q:  Do you offer a cleaning service?A:  Our cleaners can accommodate additional cleaning services for an added cost. Just ask us!Q:  Is the home ADA accessible? A:  Unfortunately, no. This home is on the 3rd floor and does not have an elevator.Q:  Can I book on behalf of a friend, family member or co-worker?A:  While we would love to host whoever you are booking for, we do need them to book for themselves with their own account. For business trips or if you book travel for your company, Airbnb allows designated bookers at companies enrolled in Airbnb for Work to book trips on behalf of others.

more description: This freshly remodeled condo with European flair is set in the trendy yet peaceful neighborhood of Bucktown - a perfect base for exploring Chicago. A short walking distance to 2 Blue line CTA stops (Western and Damen), it is surrounded by quaint neighborhood bars, restaurants, and coffee shops as well as grocery stores and trendy shopping.The spaceThis 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment also has a large and comfortable sleeper sofa in the spacious living room, making it an ideal spot for 1 to 4 guests. The living room features a 55" 4K UHD Smart TV with surround sound, a dedicated workspace and high-speed fiber internet that are great for those working from home. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances and includes in unit washer/dryer. You will have all the kitchen supplies you need to cook meals at home. The bathroom is equipped with a stand up, walk-in shower, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, towels, and other bathroom necessities. An extra perk we love is the heated bathroom floor.During the warmer months, enjoy grilling on the back patio, or kick back under the shaded awning and relax on our comfortable lounge furniture (not yet pictured).
