name: Apartment in Lake View
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Joshua8 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 4 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in June 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: With two separate apartments, this chiq home near Wrigley Field is a hidden gem. It features comfortable beds, parking; and a fenced yard; with 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 2 spacious living & dining areas and fast gigabit internet.  In an unbeatable location close to many popular attractions, this home is the perfect base for your Chicago adventures. 6 min drive to:-Andersonville & Boystown-Montrose Beach-Uptown, Green Mill, Riviera / Aragon Theaters15 min drive: Cloudgate, Downtown, Loop!The spaceKEY FEATURES:☀ 3 private bedrooms; all with Queen size bed☀ 2 bathrooms; both with tub/shower combos☀ Large kitchen area with modern appliances☀ Spacious and modern lounge☀ Walking distance to bars and restaurants☀ Private backyard☀ Washer and DryerThe home is cited regularly in 5-star reviews for being sparkly clean, nicely decorated, easy to access,  and the host being very quick to respond.Here Are A Few Kind Words From Our Past Guests:“Joshua’s place is great! It was clean, spacious, and a great location. Joshua was very quick to respond to my questions and very helpful.” - Kerry“Great location! A block from the El and Wrigley. Also quite a few great restaurants in the neighborhood. Very clean and well-maintained walkup!” - Amy“Joshua was a great host. The place was clean and as expected. We had a lovely stay. Plenty of towels and the beds were very comfortable.” - Yann☆☆ BEDROOMS ☆☆This gorgeous historical brick walk-up features three bedrooms, all with queen-size beds. Each room features neutral color tones and comfortable beds with high-end linens and pillows.The basement level has one bedroom with a cozy sitting area with a plush armchair. The first floor has two spacious bedrooms just off the dining room.☆☆ BATHROOMS ☆☆Both bathrooms feature a tub/shower combo, bathroom essentials and Hotel-quality towels.☆☆ KITCHENS ☆☆One of the interesting advantages of this home is that it has two full kitchens. Preparing feasts is that much easier! The kitchens feature expensive countertops, custom cabinets, drawers, and cabinets stocked with utensils, cups, mugs, and other kitchen gadgets.Continuing with the theme of extra space, there are two separate dining areas to have family-style meals together. The sturdy tables also double as laptop-friendly workstations. ☆☆ LOUNGES ☆☆Two separate living rooms are an added convenience. Both feature comfortable couches (with pullout memory foam beds), armchairs, and flat-screen TVs. Set the kids up with a movie in one living room while the adults enjoy cocktails and conversation in the other one!☆☆ OUTSIDE SPACE ☆☆This charming home is located in a busy and vibrant neighborhood and offers opportunities to sit outside in privacy. The grassy, fenced-in backyard area has a barbecue and plenty of room to relax. ★☆ Book Today & Let Us Take Care Of You In Chicago! ☆★

description: Clean & Bright Chicago Condo - FREE Parking Spot
name: Apartment in Logan Square
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Leo & Alex4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy your restful stay at this chic, yet comfortable 2 bedroom condo located in Chicago’s iconic Logan Square.  This newly renovated unit offers free parking for one car as well as a beautiful, fully functional, updated kitchen with a dining table for you to enjoy cooking a meal or ordering in.  You will be within walking distance of a bike rental station as well as the 606 Trail, a picturesque place to take a bike ride, walk or quick run.The spaceFeel the comforts of home while on vacation in this beautiful space. You’ll have access to a well-equipped kitchen that has everything you need in order to cook a fabulous dinner, including a dining table  and dishwasher. The master bedroom features a queen sized memory foam bed you won’t want to get out of. The second guest room is cozier and has a full sized bed and closet. The bathroom features a bathtub/shower and a hair-dryer as well as complimentary toiletries and clean hotel quality towels. If you just want to hang out and lounge, then the living room features a  comfortable couch and a smart tv with free Netflix  and Xfinity high speed internet. The cooling and heating system is equipped with humidifier control for additional comfort no matter the season. This apartment is very well kept, professionally cleaned and sanitized after each and every use.

We also have an in-unit laundry that you can use during your stay.

unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Emy1 guest ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 1 guest · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: I am renting out my extra bedroom in my 2 bed apartment for 1 guest only.  Due to Covid, Guests have access to their bedroom and bathroom only. My space is not luxury, but it's sanitized and clean, the neighborhood is cute/safe where you can feel calm/ peaceful. I have a lovely park across the street you can lounge, or walk your dog. I am in an area where there are good restaurants within walking distance.edit: Do not book my place for someone else under your profile.The spaceTo limit the transfer of viruses and bacteria for Covid (and other illnesses), I am limiting access to your bedroom and bathroom.  If you are vaccinated this still applies. The vaccine only ensures you won't die from Covid. You can still get sick from Covid and spread the virus around even being vaccinated thus the rest of the apartment is off-limits. However, you don't have to wear a mask as we won't have any interaction. You have your own entrance and I have mine. The bedroom and bath as separated from the rest of the apartment. If you are a smoker, you can smoke on the back patio. The bathroom is shared with me only although when I have guests, I take showers at the gym and brush my teeth in the kitchen. So it'll be "mostly" yours. You will need to provide your own food since no kitchen access, but I provide a brand new filtered water pitcher.  There is permit free, street parking right in front of my building. If you need laundry there are machines for pay. I am 3 blocks from the Damen brown line. I have the 50 Damen bus right outside my door.  I am exactly 1 mile from Lake Michigan. There is WIFI available and radiator heating controlled by the building.   I recently installed a AC window unit in the guest room. So there is AC for the Summer! YAY!

more description: Explore the wonderful neighborhood of Pilsen from this unique little space.  Private entrance to your bedroom with an attached bathroom with shower. The entire space is for your private use- nothing is shared. NOTE the bedroom & bathroom ARE the entire space. Designed for one person as a sleeping room. We can not host 2 people. Twin size American bed is 75 inches x 38Please CLICK "show more " below  BEFORE YOU BOOK/INQUIRE I need you to read and respond.The spacePLEASE  MESSGE ME  and include the following for a response 1.  You will need to agree to NO  visitors and NO smokers in your  message 2. Details about your stay and any questions not covered in the listingWe have outside cameras and they are monitored.  No inside cameras. Please do not book and walk in front of my neighbors home to smoke. We are simply not a good fit for smokers. You will be asked to leave immediately if you smoke or have visitors. Excellent wi-fi, heat & a/c. FREE street PARKING is not always super easy. You may have to walk a block or so. EARLY CHECK IN - I will send you a message if the cleaning service finishes before 4pm. We do not have a place to store luggage. You can look up Bounce or Luggage Hero. Inexpensive services that will hold your bags. Different locations depending on where you want to spend the day. ADDRESS : 934 W 19th St, Chicago, IL 60608, USA NOTE: The space consists of a bedroom with a single bed for one person with an adjoining bathroom with a shower. Please note although we have multiple light sources in the room there is no natural light. Does make for good sleeping:)  WE CAN ONLY HOST ONE PERSON. there is not enough room for 2 people.  Supplies Provided Keurig coffee pot, coffee, cream & sugar. Paper plates and silverware. A microwave & small refrigerator so you can re-heat a meal or keep beverages cold.  Hair dryer iron, ironing board, hand soap, shampoo& conditioner, linens and towels.PLEASE HAVE A GOVERNMENT ID AND CURRENT PIC  ( of your face) ON YOUR PROFILE WHEN MAKING A RESERVATION.Our charming little space is locate din a traditional Chicago Multi Unit brick building in the Pilsen Neighborhood of Chicago. See " GETTING AROUND"  and the "NEIGHBORHOOD" section of the listing for more information.

more description: This studio apartment is in the perfect location in Chicago for getting to Downtown via the Blue Line L or to the Hot West Loop and Randolph street restaurant row.  Walk to bars, shops, restaurants, coffee liquor stores and transportation with ease!  You will love our spa baths, in unit laundry and full modern kitchens to make it feel like a home away from home.  One of the best pizza spots in Chicago is only steps away!The spaceAt 747 Lofts we want to ensure everyone who stays feels like they are at home and can settle right in, so we provide the following amenities to all our guests!  -  Professionally trained cleaners who follow a tightly regimented cleaning and sanitizing checklist. They are equipped with a full complement of professional cleaning tools and chemicals including a hospital-grade disinfectant.- A paid parking lot is located nearby- Elevator building- Fresh towels and linens which are professionally laundered and ironed by a hotel linen company- Wireless internet is always available- TV with streaming options and DirectTV cable- Kitchen appliances including a microwave, drip coffee pot, electric tea kettle and toaster  - We provide artisanal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas.- Our Lofts are FULLY STOCKED with all the amenities of home including Malin and Goetz shampoo, conditioner and body wash, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, sponges & Method brand hand soap and dish soap.  You name it, we provide it to make you feel at home!-The full sized kitchen is stocked with cookware, utensils, glasses, cutlery, sharp knives, cutting boards, baking sheets and all the basic tools like wine openers, cheese graters, vegetable peelers, pizza cutters, etc.  - Hair dryer- Ironing board and Iron- Luggage racks and hangers

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Joan2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Chicago! Our 1-bedroom/1 bathroom apartment unit is perfect for getaway to Chicago. It's professionally designed with modern furniture that gives welcome feeling! We're located in Trendy Logan SquareDesignated parking spot is NOT available, but there is plenty of street parking available. This is a basement unit. If you're taller than 6 ft, you may have to bend down at certain areas in the unit, please keep that in mind when booking.The spaceIlluminated by sunny natural light, our 1BR features Queen-size bed, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free, fast WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!Note: This space does not have its own thermostat to control the temperature. It is automatically set to 72 degrees. If it gets too hot or cold, we ask you crack open a window. If it's not hot or cold enough, please contact us and we can adjust the temperature accordingly.

more description: Our 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment is perfect for a stay in Chicago because it is close to everything you need, including restaurants, clubs/bars, grocery stores, and even Wrigley Field! Our home has everything you need whether you're traveling for business or pleasure! Completely furnished with fully equipped kitchen and bathroom.The spaceOur stylish 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in trendy Lakeview Chicago is the ideal starting point for Windy City activities.  Whatever brings you to town, you'll be at comfort in our charming, quiet neighborhood, which is conveniently located near the Red Line train station.Our apartment has a queen bed, premium linens, and closet space. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and air-conditioning units that are individually operated.The apartment has one full bathroom, which has a shower, basin, and toilet. We offer shampoo, conditioner, and body wash, as well as hand soap and fluffy towels. There's no better way to warm up after a Chicago walk than with a hot shower!There is plenty of room for guests to relax on the sofa and watch TV.  You'll live in luxury, like the rest of the unit, with hardwood floors and modern décor.Our kitchen is fully equipped with cookware, pans, and utensils, as well as sleek granite countertops, so whether you're seeking a home-cooked meal or simply a place to put the box of deep-dish pizza, it's the place to be. Among the appliances are full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker.

Hyde Park is home to the University of Chicago, the kind of place where they discover the universe is expanding. Expand your own cultural universe ...The spaceHyde Park is home to the University of Chicago, the kind of place where they discover the universe is expanding. Expand your own cultural universe when you stay in this eclectic neighborhood, home to Frank Lloyd Wright’s Robie House, theaters, parks, and plenty of culinary destinations both seasoned (get it?) and new. Your suite includes one bedroom, a full kitchen, washer/dryer, and expansive entertainment options - and several convenient transit options to UChicago campus.

          For the safety of our guests and communities, we are following the latest CDC guidance to ensure every guest has a clean and comfortable stay. We are committed to: thoroughly disinfecting each suite with a special focus on countertops, door knobs, faucets, light switches, and other commonly used surfaces; stocking-up on extra supplies such as soaps and cleaning products; and minimizing in-person contact with our guests whenever possible.

description: GLORIOUS GOLD COAST GETAWAY
name: Condo in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Nicole And Matt2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome! Amazing Gold Coast/Streeterville location SECONDS from the LAKE and MAGNIFICENT MILE. Located on a quiet street, this apartment is tucked in between Michigan Ave and Lake Michigan. Steps away from the famous Drake Hotel, yet closer to the lake and Oak Street Beach. This spot is considered the best location in the city-- steps away from the best stores/restaurants in the world located on Michigan Ave (Mag Mile) and just north of Navy Pier.We look forward to hosting you!The spaceImplementing additional cleaning measures in response to the virus. Not only are we wiping down all the surfaces as we typically do, but we are utilizing ozone machines, making sure that all door handles, towel bars, and other surfaces like remote controls are also being fully cleaned and sanitized between stays. This is a quaint, boutique building (Harry Weese Historical Building) with only two units per floor.Take the elevator, and welcome yourself to this freshly renovated condo featuring:* Queen-Size bed with super comfy mattress* Full bathroom with towels & body wash, shampoo, conditioner* Full dining room set and utensils/pots/pans/dinnerware/glasses* Large, comfortable sectional sofa in Living Room * Chef's Kitchen stocked w/ all SS appliances and granite counter tops* East Facing Floor-to-Ceiling Windows with spectacular view of Lake Michigan in kitchen/dining room, and also from the edge of living room Other things to note about the space:Living/dining room has large SMART TV w/ cable provided through YouTube TV. Another SMART TV also in bedroom! DONE TO PERFECTION! CLOSE TO LAKE, SHOPPING, AND RESTAURANTS. Common rooftop deck with grill with even better views.Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: PARKING?A: Sometimes upon request, we may have an available parking spot for you with in/out access for a below average price. Otherwise, we recommend apps like SpotAngel or SpotHero to find free or cheap parking. There are SpotHero spots near the building for your convenience, available on a first come, first serve basis. Q: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! we provide all these things. You will have more than enough.Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 10am. Early check ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that, pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses some crazy algorithm to adjust it automatically, so we don't actually control this.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on!

Your booking is a private bedroom and fantastic amenities such as Smart internet TV,  full kitchen, free washer/dryer, fast internet & more! Great location: Very close to CTA Blue Line Kedzie Station and various bus stops. Less than 15 minutes CTA ride to downtown via Blue Line. 7 min drive to the United Center & Rush Hospital.  Very easy to get on Freeway way I-290.Everything is designed with your comfort and experience in mind. We provide budget room options for our guests but try to focus on everything that matters to you: convenience, comfort, entertainment options right in your bedroom and 24/7 customer service.

description: M2. Next to Downtown, Best location
name: Private room in Chicago
unit rental details: Private room in rental unit hosted by Eladio3 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1.5 shared baths
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1.5 shared baths**__**Joined in March 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Great location and very affordable. This place is located in a safe neighborhood. Very close to the heart of downtown. 30-35min to Millenium park. Train is 15min walking. a lot of 24/7 free parking on the street. A few blocks around there is a huge super market. 24hours fast food, etc. We provide clean towels, shampoo, coffee, WiFi, hair dryer, etc. Pretty much everything you might need. Very well located in the city and close to the interstate highways.Other things to noteThe room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! The room has one queen size bed. If you want to add 3rd or 4th guest in the reservation I could add 1 extra air mattress with no extra fee if the reservation is set for 3 or 4. If the reservation is for 2 and you’d like to have an extra air mattress we charge $15p/night and we provide air mattress and linens for it. the room will become smaller for luggage becase you will have two beds on it. This is a good option if you want to save even more money otherwise you can book two rooms! Smoking is not allowed. Neighbors smoke so common areas might have a strong smell of smoke. We do have diffusers and everything inside the apt. But if you have any condition, or can’t handle the common area smell, do not book as it won’t be refundable due to this matter.Neighbors could be noisy As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place or another place, or have an earphone or something to block the sound. There will be security cameras ON in shared spaces only( living room, kitchen, hallways, entrance of the apartment, exits of the apartment).

description: 10% Winter Promo! Best 1 BR apartment in the City!
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Shaun2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Chicago! Our 1BR apartment is a perfect place to stay on any Chicago getaway, whether business or vacation. It is professionally designed with a full kitchen, living room, and modern touch, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.  The apartment building is within steps to stores, restaurants, transportation. It's one great spot in the City!The spaceThe apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!  There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free, fast WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.  Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertop. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. There is a common laundry area for guests which they can use during their stay. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!  During your stay, the whole apartment is yours and only yours.  Ever dreamed about jetting off to your own Chicago apartment? Well, now’s your chance to bring that fantasy to life. During your stay, the whole apartment is yours and only yours. What’s better than staying in the heart of Downtown Chicago? How about an apartment that gives you the best of both worlds: minutes from the most exciting attractions of the Magnificent Mile and Navy Pier, but far enough away that you can get a taste of authentic Chi-Town life like a local.  Our place is a 10-minute walk from the Wellington L Station which can take you straight into Downtown. Our neighborhood itself, though, is best explored foot, so you can meander through the quaint boutiques and tasty eateries while enjoying the lush trees that line the streets. Walk just 10 minutes east and you’ll stumble upon the spectacular Lakefront Trail, which offers panoramic views of Lake Michigan and is a fantastic place to run, walk, and people watch. You’ll never go hungry in this ‘hood. Some of our favorite places to eat include Crisp, known for Korean-style fried chicken, Chilam Balam for Mexican small plates, and the delicious Mediterranean fare at Troy. When you’re craving something sweet, walk just 2 minutes to Bobtail Ice Cream for a milkshake, sundae, or a scoop of their chocolate chip merlot ice cream. Or chocolate ice cream infused with Jack Daniels, if that’s what you’re into.  In the mood for a night on the town but you don’t want to deal with the crowds Downtown? There are plenty of low-key, exciting, sophisticated, and eclectic bars here that will be perfect for the kind of evening you want to have. From the whisky-centric Duke Of Perth to the 80-year-old Jake's Pub (they even have a jukebox) to Bar Pastoral’s wine and cheese expertise, there’s something for everyone.  And if you just want to relax and watch a show, you have options within walking distance. Catch the latest blockbuster at Landmark's Century Centre Cinema or a live drama at TimeLine Theatre Company, both about 5 minutes from our place. Not much further away are the Laugh Factory comedy club and the Blue Man Group’s Briar Street Theater for more live entertainment.  Why break the bank with a pricey rental car when you can take advantage of Chicago’s top-notch public transportation system? Our place is just a 10-minute walk from Wellington Station, where you can catch the Brown Line and the Purple/Red Line. Any line will take you to Downtown Chicago in just about 15 minutes, or you can head north to Uptown or Evanston on the Red Line, which later turns into the Purple Line.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 2 shared baths**__**Joined in November 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to our Irving Park home, just a five minute walk to the blue line and Kennedy Expressway. We are conveniently located between O'Hare Airport and downtown, making it a quick trip to either destination. In addition, Wrigleyville is only 15 mins away for Cubs games and Logan Square and Wicker Park nightlife are both off of the blue line and only take 10 mins to get to. There are great restaurants in our neighborhood and we are happy to make some recommendations!The spaceRoom #1 You will have a full size bed in a private room with keypad access, so you can come and go as you please. You will be sharing the kitchen, living room, and bathrooms with other airbnb guests. There is a foosball table and board games in the living room. Since this is a shared space, we require quiet hours between 9PM-8AM. We also have security cameras in common areas and we do not allow smoking.  We are a husband and wife team and we live in the unit upstairs. We speak English and Spanish. We tend to give our guests space, but we are always love giving recommendations and we are always happy to assist guests. Since we live in the building, if there is anything you need one of us is usually around. We are here to help!  Every guest is provided clean bedding and a towel. Each bathroom is stocked with hand soap, body soap, 2-in-1 shampoo/conditioner, and toilet paper. The kitchen has all your essentials, pots, pans, silverware, drinkware, plates, bowls, as well as free Keurig coffee and tea. In addition, guests have access to a hairdryer, iron, and extra blankets.  If you have additional guests, we have multiple listings all in the same building. Each room accomodates up to 2 guests. Check out our other listings to see if we have availability!  Guests are not permitted in backyard.

name: Shared room in Chicago

more description: This COED SHARED room(hostel-ish) is occupied by BOTH men and women. It is NOT a private room. This listing is for bed C(BOTTOM BUNK.) We are in an upper-middle-class neighborhood. . Our home has 5600 sq ft and sits on 1 acre of land, which is virtually unheard of in the city of Chicago.  We have a huge backyard. We are just a 4-minute walk to public transportation. There are 4 bunk beds so it can hold up to eight people. I affirm that I have read the foregoing description by reserving this bed.The spaceThis is a shared room, not just a shared home. This room can hold up to 8 people. The size of our home is not normal within the city limits of Chicago and is almost unheard of with Airbnb. This shared room has its own private bathroom.We have more space than you will ever need. We have two oversize living rooms. One is more of a quiet room that our guests have used to just relax and read. The other has a 65-inch smart TV you will have access to in order to watch a multitude of streaming apps. We have two full-size dining areas that you may use to relax and dine and/or interact with other guests. We have 2 patios that past guests have utilized to barbeque or just take in fresh air. rt tv

name: Apartment in Chicago

more description: Beautiful studio in the heart of Hyde Park - blocks from University of Chicago school, hospital and lake and 6 miles to downtown - express bus. 4 miles to soldier FieldThe spaceBeautiful garden room in the middle of a Hyde park that has been recently renovated with large windows and plenty of light, your own bathroom, shower and a private entrance. You will have your own mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, hot plate, air fryer, workspace. There is a shared  washer/dryer that you can use. 6 miles to downtown, 4 miles to soldier field and 2 miles to McCormick place. You will be in the heart of Hyde park, one block from 53rd street - the main thoroughfare, full of interesting restaurants, shops and bars. Walking distance to the lake, University of Chicago hospital and school - or there is a bus there drops you off right up front one block away from Trader Joe’s and a few blocks from Target. Located on a quiet residential street only One block from the 55 and 171 bus lines that go directly to the University of Chicago and a 5 min. walk to the 6 bus that goes direct to downtown Chicago. The 55 bus goes directly to Midway airport and O’Hare is also easily reachable by public transportation. The University shuttle passes right in front of the house.walking distance to the museum of science and and industry !!

more description: Perfectly located in the most fashionable and trendsetting neighborhood. This luxury apartment has the best view of the city so contact us quick on social for the best deal. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern stainless-steel appliances and all the amenities you’d need. The building houses a state-of-the-art fitness center and a rooftop lounge that will blow you away with its spectacular views. For those summer days you can enjoy the outdoor terrace, sundeck with pool, and fire pit. Parking is difficult and expensive in Chicago.  We offer spots right in the building, with in/out access and direct elevator to your floor.The spaceBEDROOMS:• Master Suite: King bed, en-suite bathroom• Guest Suite: Queen bed, en-suite bathroom• Queen air mattress available• Huge windows offering spectacular views of the city• In unit washer & dryer• Fully-equipped kitchen • Flat Screen TV/Cable• High-speed Internet• Stainless steel appliances• Spacious, walk-in closets• Individually controlled heat and air• Shampoo, conditioner, & body wash in bathrooms• Hair dryer• Iron/ironing boardAPARTMENT AMENITIES:• Outdoor pool• Fitness center• Rooftop deck with sweeping Chicago views• Business center• Lounge

name: Apartment in Chicago

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: In Rogers Park, one of Chicago's best neighborhoods, old, brick apartment buildings line up neatly in rows along streets lined with trees. Discover a new favorite restaurant on Clark Street every night of the week, from Mexican to Romanian to Italian to Nigerian and more. Or, go shopping on Rogers Avenue. Loyola Beach is a great place to spend the summer days tanning. Get on the "L" and explore more of the Windy City by stopping at the stations on Howard Street, Jarvis Avenue, and Morse Avenue.The spaceOur three-bedroom apartment comes with a full bathroom that includes a shower, sink, and toilet. We also provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels.There is plenty of space for visitors to relax on the sofa and watch TV on our flat-screen television. You can also check your emails at the living room deskOur kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, and utensils, so you can satisfy your craving for a home-cooked meal or simply put the box of deep-dish pizza down. A refrigerator, a gas stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker and toaster are available. You are welcome to dine in our spacious dining room. You may also use our washer/dryer during your stay.
